hymns.title: ABASOMI MUJJE TUSOME MMWE
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Abasomi mujje tusome mmwe
Bannamukisa mujje tumusinze
Tugulumizze Omukama twebaze x 2

1. Tufukamire mu maaso g’Omukama ono,
Tuyimbire Omukama owaffe;
Tumukubire emizira leero, 
Kubanga yasinga.

2. Katuyimbire mu maaso g’Omukama ono,
Tujagulize mu Mukama owaffe;
Ye mukulu eyakola byonna,
Ali awo ng’alamula.

3. Tufukamire mu maaso g’Omukama ono,
Tuyimbire Omukama owaffe,
Mu kuyiga ekuliwo leero,
Kubanga y’atuyise. 

4. Ffe katumusabe Omusumba w’obuliga bwe ono,
Ategereze ebyaffe abaana
Atukuume mu kisibo kye ffenna,
Ng’ataasa ng’alunda.

5. Mmwe muwulire eddoboozi ly’Omukama ono,
Mmwe muggule emitima egyamwe
Mu mugondere Mukama yekka,
Ye nnannyini ddembe.

hymns.title: ALLELUIA – ALLELUIA
hymns.content:
Chorus: //Alleluia - Alleluia
               Alleluia - Alleluia
               Alleluia – Alleluia//

1. Kigambo kya Ruhanga,
         Tukiraranje
	Omu bushondashonda bw’ensi

2. Enyangani za Ruhanga
		Tweheyo
		Tumukugizege ebiro byonna.

3. Katugize  nya kutuganza
	    Tumusiime
	Ne tuzina Alleluia.

hymns.title: ALLELUIA
hymns.content:
Chorus: Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia.

1. Mutendereze Omukama wano mu nnyumba ye,
Mumutendereze olw’ekitiibwa kye.
Mutendereze Omukama wano mu nnyumba ye,
Mumutendereze oyo nnyini bulamu

2. Mutendereze Omukama olw’ekitiibwa kye,
Mumutendereze olw’obulungi bwe.
Mutendereze Omukama olw’ekitiibwa kye,
Mumutendereze olw’obukulu bwe.

3. Mutendereze Omukama mmwe abatonde be,
Mumutendereze Omutonzi wa byonna.
Mutendereze Omukama Katonda atalemwa,
Mumutendereze olw’obukulu bwe


4. Mutendereze Omukama  mu nnyimba ezinyuma
Mumutendereze asaana kwagalwa..
Mutendereze Omukama mu ddoboozi erya wamu,
Mumutendereze nga muli wamu.

hymns.title: EMBUGA ZO NNUNGI
hymns.content:
Ekidd: //Embuga zo nnungi Mukama wange,
            Embuga zo nnungi Mukama wange,
	    Aa! Ntwala eyo gyemba mpumulira nga nkutenda//  

1. Twesiimye nnyo abaana b’engoma ffe abaana bo olwa Batismu,
Tweyanziza Mukama waffe, ffe b’oyise olw’okutwagala.

2. Luno lwe lunaku olw’Omukama, tumutende ffe mu nnyumba ye;
Wamma tumutende Mukama waffe mu Yeruzalemu wakati.

3. Ka nngende ku Altari y’Omukama, Kawamigero oyo eyatutonda,
Mujje tumutende Katonda Kitaffe tumwebaze.

hymns.title: HA! NNAMULONDO YO NNUNGI.
hymns.content:
Chorus: Ha! Nnamulondo yo nnungi
	Ayi Mukama, nnomwaliiro kwetudde gutengenya.
        Nnegomba okubeera awo,
        Awali ggwe, nga nsinza
        Bwentyo nga ntenda obuyinza bwo.

1. Tuzze wuwo olwa leero – Tusinze wamu ffe b’olunda ab’enda emu
Mu kiggwa kyo Mukama owaffe – Taata tukkirize
Tutuuke awo ku mwaliiro.

2. Ggwe owaffe –Ffe abasobya ne tukunyiiza buli lukya ate ne luziba.
Twekembe ensobi tuzikyawe
Tuyubule Taata otuzze buto mu kukiriza.

3. Twebaza nnyo byotuwadde – enneema z’otuwa.
Tuzisiimye ak’ensusso – Ka tubikyawe ebibi byaffe ebyo
Taata tusonyiwe, ffe tubikyawe leero ne bulijjo.

4. Nga tussa kimu – Ffe abaana bo leero
Gano amawulire agasanyusa – ag’ekigambo kyo ekitubuulirira.
Tusiibe nago mawulire malungi olw’okwagala n’okukutenda
Ggwe Nnamugereka.

hymns.title: JANGU JANGU YEZU KABAKA
hymns.content:
Ekidd: Jangu Jangu Yezu Kabaka,
            Omulokozi wa bantu.
            Jangu okutuwonya,
            Jangu, Jangu, Jangu.

1. Edda lyonna tusuubira,             
Era nga tulindirira,                        
Yamba Ssebo tusaasire.                
Tofa ku bibi byaffe,                      
Yima ku bunaku bwaffe,              
Tujje mu nvuba zaffe.                   
Jangu, Jangu, Jangu.                     

2. Yezu Kabaka laba bwe twafiirwa
E Ggulu nga ligaliddwa 
Ffenna n’etuvumirirwa
Abaana be watonda            
Sitaani bonna abatwala       
Jangu obataase mangu            
Jangu, Jangu, Jangu.                      

3. Vva mu ggulu ojje ewaffe,      
Ayi Ggwe Katonda waffe           
Otuggye mu bibi byaffe.             
Wewaawo tusanidde,                   
Omuliro ogw’emirembe;             
Naye era tuddiremu                     
Jangu, Jangu, Jangu                     

4. Tunuulira mu nsi zonna
Ffenna tuli mu maziga,
Tukusaba otusaasire.
Ggwe ow’ekisa Kitaffe, 
Tukusaba ojje mangu,      
Okutubeera Yezu Kabaka,       
Jangu, Jangu, Jangu.  

5. Bw’okiriza jangu ewaffe,         
Ng’otuwonyeza n’olumbe,            
Tuli kutenda n’essanyu.                 
Ggwe Kabaka ow’amaanyi,          
Kulembera tuwangule,                   
Omulabe Sitaani,                           
Jangu, Jangu, Jangu.                      

6. Laba ennaku zitujjudde
Mu mubiri ne mu mwoyo,  
Jangu mangu zikkakkane.   
Tukwesiga Ggwe wekka    
Kitaffe totwabulira,               
Ayi Mukama waffe,
Jangu, Jangu, Jangu.

hymns.title: JANGU YANGUWA OKUJUNA
hymns.content:
Chorus: Jangu yanguwa okujuna
               Jangu otuddize eddembe Yezu Kabaka,
               Tukwesiga gwe musaasizi. x 2

1. Mutegekere amakubo Omukama,
Mwe munyirize emitima gyammwe,
Mmwe mugolole amayisa agammwe,
Lwemuliraba Omukama ng’ajja.

2. Omulanzi ye Yoana alanze
Mmwe mulungamye amakubo gammwe,
Lye ddoboozi lyoyo alanga,
Nti mutegeke emitima gyammwe.

3. Katunyirize amakubo agaffe,
Tubugirize Omukama nga azze.
Katugolole amakubo agaffe,
Tusanyukire Omukama ng’azze.
