hymns.title: MARCHING UNITED IN JESUS THE KING
hymns.content:
Chorus: Marching united in Jesus the King,
               Marching together to Heaven.
               Marching united in Jesus the King,
               Marching together to Heaven.

1. God our Creator and Father,
Children of yours we are.
So now we ask you to bless us,
Bless both our children and parents.

2. Grateful to you for the great gifts;
Country and wealth and all;
Which we your children received
Cheerful we sing and praise you.

hymns.title: MUJJE TUSOME
hymns.content:
Chorus: //Mujje mujje tusome,
                  Abaana ba Katonda balonze,
		  Ffe ggwanga lye, ffe baana ba Katonda balonze.//
		  Mujje muyingire mu kigwa kye, 
		  //Tu musinze tumwebaze nnyinimu. //

1. Wabuyinza watendo, Mukama Katonda owa magye (x 2).
Yatugabira obulamu natuzaala, kya kitalo 
Mu batismu, yatufuula baana, ffe ggwanga lye.
Tu mugulumize, tumutende, yye Kristu alokola.
Tu mugulumize, tumutende, yye Kristu alokola ensi eno.

2.  Mwe abalungi mweyanze, Mukama Katonda Mutagobwa (x 2).
Yatumulisa amagezi natulonda, kyamagero yeyasindika,
Yatuma na Mwaama eri abaddu be.
Tu mugulumize, tumutende, yye Kristu alokola.
Tu mugulumize, tumutende, yye Kristu alokola ensi eno.

3.  Tu mutende mu nyimba, Mukama Katonda mutagobwa (x2).
Gwe abakwesiga obamanyi nobataasa, kya mazima obataasa
Obalunda Ddunda noba ngabo.
Tu mugulumize, tumutende, yye Kristu alokola.
Tu mugulumize, tumutende, yye Kristu alokola ensi eno.

4.  Omuyinza wa maanyi, Mukama Katonda musaasizi (x2).
Ya tumanyisa ebikulu ebyaaliwo ngatutonda,
Mu masooka yatulondamu ffe ngatwagala.
Tu mugulumize, tumutende, yye Kristu alokola.
Tu mugulumize, tumutende, yye Kristu alokola ensi eno.

5.  Mwe abatuufu bagamba, Mukama Katonda mu nnyumba ye (x 2)
Mube batume, abakozi abategeera, bamazima abalungamu,
Abantu abateefu, eggwanga essomi.
Tu mugulumize, tumutende, yye Kristu alokola.
Tu mugulumize, tumutende, yye Kristu alokola ensi eno.

hymns.title: NATENDANGA OMUKAMA
hymns.content:
Chorus: Natendanga Omukama, obudde bwona,
	       Natendanga Omukama, obudde bwona,
               Natendanga Omukama, emirembe gyonna nze.

1. Natenderezanga Omukama obudde bwonna
Etendo lye mukamwa kange bulijjo,
Omwoyo gwange gwenyumiriza mu Mukama
Abetowaaze bawulire basanyuke.
     
2. Natenderezanga Yezu Kabaka emisana n’ekiro,
Era natenderezanga Yezu Kabaka,
Obudde bwonna obw’obulamu bwange.

3. Natenderezanga Yezu Kabaka nga ngenda okwebaka,
Era natenderezanga Yezu Kabaka,
Kumakya nga ngolokose.

4. Natenderezanga Omugaati Ogw’obulamu nga ngenda okugufuna,
Era nagutenderezanga,
Nga maze okugufuna.

5. Era natenderezanga Mwaana mu bulamu bunno,
Era natenderezanga Mwaana,
Emirembe n’emirembe.

6. Natenderezanga Mwaana, abantu bonna nga balaba,
Era natenderezanga Yezu Kabaka,
Ensi yonna nebweba nga egaana..

7. Natenderezanga Mwaana, abagala mumpagire,
Natenderezanga Omukama,
Kubanga ye Mutonzi wange.

8. Natendanga Omukama munsi yonna wembeera,
Natendanga Yezu Kabaka,
Amawanga gonna gamutendereze.

hymns.title: NGA NNUNGI
hymns.content:
Chorus: //Nga nnungi, nga nnungi, altari ya Mukama wange,
               Nnegomba mbeere eyo mu mbuga zo gyooli!//

1. Ayi Mukama gwe ow’amagye, ngakisanyusa ekisulo kyo,
Omwoyo gwange gwegomba gwagala kufa empya z’Omukama.
Omwoyo gwange n’omutima gwange, bisanyukira mu Katonda 
Omulamu.

2. Nga bassanyuka obutamala, abali kati mu nyumba yo,
Emirembe gyonna bagenda kuyimbanga ettendo lyo,
Ngabesiimye, ggwe abakwesiga, emitima gyabwe gijaguliza mu Mukama.

3. Lunaku lumu mu nyumba yo, lukira nkumi anti awalala,
Omulyango gwokka ku nyumba yo kuno gukira wala ebisuulo byonna, gukira wala ebisulo by’abonoonyi.

hymns.title: NZE MUSUMBA
hymns.content:
Ekidd: Nze Musumba, Nze Musumba, 
            Nze Musumba Omulungi abagala,
            Nze Musumba. (x 2)

1. (a) Nze nzimanyi;              Nze Musumba
 Endiga zange;                       Nze Musumba
 Nazo zimmanyi nze;            Nze Musumba Omulungi abagala,
                                                  Nze Musumba

(b) Nze nziyita;                       Nze Musumba
Endiga zange;                         Nze Musumba
Nazo zimmanyi nze;              Nze Musumba Omulungi abagala,
                                                  Nze Musumba

(c) Okuziyamba;                     Nze Musumba
 Lye ssanyu lyange;               Nze Musumba
 Zonna ne nzikuuma;             Nze Musumba Omulungi abagala,
                                                  Nze Musumba
	
(d) Okubulwa emu;                 Nze Musumba
Kwe kunyolwa ennyo;            Nze Musumba
Zonna nzagala nze;                Nze Musumba Omulungi abagala,
                                                   Nze Musumba

2. Mpaayo obulamu bwange okubeera abantu
Nzuuno kale, bonna mbagala. (x 2)

            (a) Ssirundira mpeera bantu bange;  
                  Tukwaniriza Ggwe       
                  Musumba, Yezu Kabaka ow’Obuyinza tukulembere.
                                                                                  
	     (b) Ssirudira mpeera muje mwenna;         Tukwaniriza Ggwe....
                   Ssibasosola abajja mujje mwenna;      Tukwaniriza Ggwe....
                   Sibalira mpaayo obulamu bwange;     Tukwaniriza Ggwe....
                   N’obwesige nnunda buli ajja yenna;   Tukwaniriza Ggwe....
                   Siyabulira n’omu ampita nze;             Tukwaniriza Ggwe....
                   Nnabalokola sijja kubasuula;              Tukwaniriza Ggwe....
                   Ndibatumira najja Mwoyo wange ;     Tukwaniriza Ggwe....
                   Mulyebaza wamma mu ssanyu eyo;   Tukwaniriza Ggwe....

Nze Musumba, Nze Musumba, Nze Musumba Omulungi      abagala, Nze Musumba. (x 2).

hymns.title: OMUTIMA GWANGE
hymns.content:
Ekidd: Omutima gwange n’omubiri gwange leero bijaguza
Anti biraga eri Katonda Omulamu.

1. Ekisulo kyo nga kyagalwa
Ayi Mukama, ekisulo kyo nga kyagalwa!

2. Omwoyo gwange gwegomba nnyo empya ez’Omukama.
Omutima gunnuma nzitukemu, Mukama wange.

3. Enkazaluggya nga tebulwa w’ezimba
Akataayi nako nga keekolera ekisu kyako.
Era n’obwaana nebufuna we bwebaka.

4. Abo beesimye nnyo abasula mu nju yo
Ayi Mukama, abantu bo bakutenda.

5. Oyo eyetegese mu mutima, yeesimye.
Mu nngendo entukuvu gw’oyamba yeesimye.

6. Ojje obongeremu, Ayi Mukama, obuzira bwo
Mu Sion mw’osula amaaso bakwegese.

7. Nze nkwegayiridde, Ayi Mukama nnyini magye,
Era owa Yakobo, tega amatu, otuwulire.

8. Mazima n’olunaku olumu luti mu mpya zo,
Lusinga olukumi ze tumala ggwe w’otaba.

9. Nsiima nnyimirire ku kifugi eky’enju yo.
Okusinga mu weema aboonoonyi mwe basangwa.

10. Mukulu w’amagye, besiimye abakwesiga.
Ggwe tomma birungi, abakusaba bo bafuna.

hymns.title: TUZZE GY’OLI BE WATONDA
hymns.content:
1. Tuzze gy’oli be watonda
:Ggwe
Tuzze tuutuno, Katonda
:Omutonzi omwagalwa
Tuzze gy’oli tukusinze
:Oh! Ow’amaanyi ow’obuyinza,
Osaana kwagalwa (x2)

Ekidd: Tumukubire enngoma gwe twaniriza
Omukama Nnyinimu
Tumuyimbire ne mu nnyimba
Afuga eggulu n’ensi ow’ettendo
Wuuno amazima! Ali mu nnyumba ye. (x2)

2. Twesiimye ffe mu kifo kyo
:Ggwe
Tweyanze wano we tuzze
:Omutonzi omwagalwa
Wamma enju yo ya kitiibwa
:Oh! Ow’amaanyi ow’obuyinza,
Osaana kwagalwa (x2)

hymns.title: WAMA MUJJE TUSINZE
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Wama mujje tusinze x 2
Yezu Kabaka Katonda
Kubanga yafuga
Emirembe gyonna.

1. Gwe Katonda ataggwawo
Ggwe wava mu Patri
Alina obuyinza
Abantu bonna munsi
Bakugulumize

2. Mwena abakiriza
Mujje tutendereze
Yezu Kabaka waffe
Ffe gwetwesiga

3. Yezu Mufalume tumusifu x 2
Ndiye mwenyezi wa Duniya
Ndiye mwenyezi wa Binguni
Milele na milele

4. Tumugulumize,
Yezu Kabaka omutefu,
Omwagalwa omufuzi,
We ggulu n’ensi.

5. Tumusinze Yezu Kabaka,
Alina obulamu
Bw’ensi n’obwo mu ggulu
Era ye Mugaati
Ogw’Obulamu.

6. Kitaffe olwe kisakye
Yatuwa omwaana we
Tumuwe ekitiibwa kye
Tufune obulamu.

7. Yatuwa Omugaati
Ogw’obulamu tugulyenga
Bulijjo tuberewo
Emirembe ggyonna

8. Baganda baffe mwenna
Tweyune Yezu Kabaka
Alitutwala ewuwe
Ku mbaga yo mu ggulu.

9. Yezu Kabaka tumusinze
Emirembe gyonna
Buli wobeera
Ng’omutendereza.

10. Mwenna abakiriza
Yezu Kabaka owa Mazima
Eyatujja mu nzikiza
Natuwa ekitangala

11. Yezu Mufalume wa Binguni.
Mwenyezi wa Duniya
Mukomboozi wa Duniya
Tunakuwomba tusamiye
Zote zambi zetu.

12. Yezu Kabaka ggwe Kitaffe x 2
Omusumba omulungi
Katukusinze nga bulijjo.

hymns.title: ALI WA GGULU
hymns.content:
Chorus: Ali wa ggulu eyantonda nnyini buyinza
Ali na wano, ye nno ali mu ggulu ne mu nsi
Oyo ow’ekitiibwa gwe nzirinngana.

1. Bannange Katonda yeebale.   Ali wa ggulu...
Twesiimye abatonde ffenna.
Tatuvaako emisana n’ekiro.

2. Ndabira wa Omutonzi wange.   Ali wa ggulu...
Kirimaanyi omutamanyiirwa.
Ndabira wa omulungi, Taata.

3. Ggwe amyansa okusinga n’enjuba,   Ali wa ggulu...
Lwaki nno sikulaba nze?
Amaaso ganzibule ggwe.

4. Wanneewa ku lwa mukwano.   Ali wa ggulu....
Wampa ensi eno n’ogiyonja.
Ko n’eggulu eryo n’oliwunda.

5. Mbonabona ku lwa mukwano.  Ali wa ggulu....
Siri mulekwa anti n’akamu nze.
Obunaku musango gwange.

6. Tusanyuke tujaguzenga.    Ali wa ggulu....
Twagalane basseruganda.
Tatuli wala, omuzadde waffe.

7. Ffenna abagalwa tusinze.    Ali wa ggulu....
Ffe tuvuze eddoboozi wonna
Amiina! Alleluia.

hymns.title: AMATENDO GA YEZU KABAKA
hymns.content:
1. Tukunganidde gyoli Kabaka
Tukutende mu nyimba zaffe.

Chorus: Ave Ave Yezu Kabaka
Ave Ave Yezu Kabaka

2. Gwoli muzadde, Yezu Kabaka
Eyatuzaala ffe abaana bo.

3. Gwoli Katonda nnyini nneema,
Abajja gyoli obalokola.

4. Tolina bbala mu mwoyo gwo
Kuba gwe nnyini butukuvu.

5. Ye Ggwe asanidde okwagalwa,
Ye Ggwe asanidde okutenda.

6. Endabirwamu y’obulungi,
Omwerabirwa empisa ennungi.

7. Abaali nawe tukuyita,
Kabaka waffe, Yezu Kabaka.

8. Ggwe ow’obuyinza, ggwe ow’ekisa,
Ffe abateyinza totuleka.

9. Musumba waffe, Ggwe Kabaka,
Wa bajjajjafe abakulanga.

10 Kuffe abalwala Ggwe bulamu,
Oli tutwala ne mu Ggulu.

11. Tusabirenga ffe abaanabo,
Tukwagale nnyo Yezu Kabaka.

hymns.title: AMAWANGA GONNA (Version i)
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Amawanga gonna gakusinza,
Gwe ow’ekitiibwa Yezu Kabaka,
Naffe wano munsi tukulonze,
Obereemu ddala Kabaka.

1. Mu kusooka omuntu yamutonda,
Abeerewo emirembe gyonna.
Katonda namusa mu nnimiro
Eya Eden alabirire.

2. Naye omuntu nanyoma Katonda, 
Nalya ku muti gweyamugaana,
Nafirwa omukwano gwa Katonda, Tulyoke tufune obulamu
Era nakolimirwa.

3. Olwe kisa kya Patri,
Yatuwa omwaana we omu yekka,
Najja munsi okutununula,
Ffena tulyoke tulokoke.

4. Ekyamuleta munsi munno,
Kwekumanyisa amazima,
Nti ye Kabaka afuga byonna
Ava mu lumbe nayingira

 5. Yatuteeka munsi munno ffenna
Okumanya Yezu Kabaka,
Okumwagala nokumusinza,
Ow’amaziima Kabaka.

6.Yatuuwa omugaati gw’obulaamu
Tugulyenga ffenna bulijjo,
Tuberewo emirembe gyonna.
Tuberewo emirembe gyonna.

7. Yezu Kabaka kituufu ye Katonda
Baganda baffe tumweyune
Atusonyiwe ebibi byaffe,
Atuwe obulamu obutagwaawo

8. Era kituufu ye Katonda,
Amukiriza tavunanibwa,
Amawanga gonna gamusinze.
Mu bulamu obutagwawo.

hymns.title: AMAWANGA GONNA (Version ii)
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Amawanga gonna gakunngaanye,
Okusinza Yezu Kabaka,
Naffe wano mu nsi tukulonze,
Obereemu ddala Mukama.

1. Emirembe nga teginnasooka,
Mwaana wa Patri nnyini ggulu
Yaliwo Kabaka, ye Katonda,
Omuyinza wa buli kantu.

2. Eggulu n’ensi ye yabitonda,
Byonna bikwata amateeka ge.
Mu bantu, abamu bakyagaana;
Yezu Kabaka ow’ekisa bawangule.

3. Ku musaalaba ku Kalivario,
Yezu Kabaka yatufiirira ffenna:
Nafuuka bwatyo nnanyini myoyo,
Olw’okuginunula gyonna.

4. Abantu yabawa Eklezia,
Okubalaga eby’omu ggulu
Bonna mwe banaakunngaaniranga
Emyoyo gijjule obulamu.

5. Bwe yali ng’addayo n’alagira,
Abantu bonna baagalane,
N’amawanga okutebenkera
Yezu Kabaka ye Kabaka ow’eddembe.

hymns.title: ATENDEREZEBWE OMUKAMA
hymns.content:
Ekkidd: Atenderezebwe Omukama,
Atenderezebwe Omukama Katonda ow’amagye
Atenderezebwe Omukama,
Agulumizibwe Omutonzi we ggulu n’ensi

1. Mu kiggwa kye ekitukuvu      - Tumutende
Mu ddoboozi ery’entongooli
Mu nngoma ezo ne mu nnyimba
Mu ngoye envuzi n’amadinda

2. Ku makya bwe tugolokoka   - Tumutende
Mu mirimu egya buli ngeri
Mu ngendo eza buli ngeri
Ekiro bwe twebaka otulo.

3. Mu kwegayirira okutukuvu,  - Tumutende
Mu ssala eza buli ngeri
Mu ssanyu nga tusagambiza,
Mu nnaku bwe tunakuwala.

4. Ba Ssabamalayika eyo mu ggulu,  - Bamutende
Bamalayika eyo mu ggulu,
Abatukirivu aba buli ngeri
Ebitonde byonna ebyensi.                     Bimutende

5. Ebinyonyi eby’omu bbanga  - Bimutende
Ebyewalula n’ebiwuka
Ebisolo eby’eyo mu nsiko
Ebyennyanja n’ennyanja.

6. Ebinene ebyaka waggulu   - Bimutende
Amasozi n’emitendera
Ebimuli ebya buli ngeri
Ebitonde byonna eby’ensi

7. Ffe nga tukyali ku nsi kuno  - Bimutende
Ne bwe tuligenda mu Ggulu
Twesiime naye lubeerera.
Emirembe gyonna mu Ggulu

hymns.title: AVE AVE YEZU KABAKA
hymns.content:
Ekidd: Ave Ave Yezu Kabaka
Ave Ave Yezu Kabaka

1. Tukutendereza
Nga tusanyuka
Ne Bamalayika
Ave Kabaka

2. Ye Ggwe ekitangala
Yezu Kabaka,
Goba ekizikiza
Mu myoyo gyaffe.

3. Kabaka ojjukira,
Nga abantu bangi
Mu Ggwe basubira
N’essanyu lingi

4. Ayi Yezu Kabaka
Yamba abaana bo
Ng’ojuna ng’okyusa
Abakwegaana.

5. Ffenna abakiriza
Totwerabira
Bw’olitusonyiwa
Tulikutenda

6. Naffe abaana bo
Katusse kimu
Tuyimbire wamu
Ave Kabaka.

7. Toyabuliranga
Emyoyo gyaffe
Ffena tukwesiga
Ggwe Nnantalemwa.

8. Twala emyoyo gyaffe
Yezu Kabaka
Mu bwa Kabaka bwo
Obwe mirembe.

9. Katulowozenga
Yezu Kabaka
Tumulamusenga
Ave Kabaka.

hymns.title: BAANA BA YEZU KABAKA
hymns.content:
Ekidd: 
Baana ba Yezu Kabaka
Tukunngaane, tusanyuke
Tuwe ekitiibwa Yezu Kabaka
Ffenna tubugane essanyu.

1. Yezu Kabaka ggwe otuwolereza
Bulijjo tweyamba gyoli.
Yanguwa okutudduukirira
Otulokole mu bubi.

2. Obuyinza wafuna bungi
Obw’okugoba Sitaani
Abaseemya leero bayinze
Batutaseeko obagobe.

3. Yezu Kabaka abaana bo besiimye
Obawonyanga mu nnaku:
Obajune obakubagize
Obawenga ne Ggulu.

4. Katonda tusaba otuyambe
Tuleme kukujeemera
Tunyweze ebiragiro byo
Olyoke otuule mu ffe.

5. Yezu Kabaka Katonda waffe
Tugende twesiime nawe
Yezu Kabaka Omulokozi waffe
Naye atujjuze essanyu lye.

hymns.title: EKITIIBWA KYA YEZU KABAKA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Ekitiibwa kya Yezu Kabaka
Kibune munsi yonna,
Tumweyune atujune,
Atwale emyoyo gyaffe.

1. Mu ggulu ba Malayika,
Bakuyita Kabaka,
Naffe abantu munsi zaffe,
Tukuyita Kabaka.

2. Ebibi byaffe nga bingi,
Tugende eri Yezu Kabaka,
Anabitusonyiwanga,
Eddembe linaddawo.

3. Abalwala n’abadaaga,
Tumukunganireko,
Anatukubagizanga,
Eddembe linaddawo.

4. Yezu Kabaka omutukirivu,
Omulokozi omwagalwa,
Omulungi omuteefu,
Asanidde okwagalwa.

hymns.title: FFENA KATUSINZE YEZU KABAKA
hymns.content:
Chorus: Ffena katusinze Yezu Kabaka x 2

1. Abantu bonna mukusooka
Bonna bali balungi
Ate kyoka nebasobya.
Katonda mukwagala kwe.
Yatuwa Omwaana we
Buli yenna amukiriza
Awone omuliro

Chorus: Ffena katusinze ....... x 2

2. Yezu Kabaka najja
Okutununula.
Yakka munsi nga ava mu ggulu.
Nafuuka atyo omwaana w’omuntu
Yezu Kabaka yebale
Yatunaazako ebibi
Buli yenna amukiriza
Awone omuliro

Chorus: Ffena katusinze ....... x 2

3. Omwaana oyo wa Katonda.
Bonna abantu mumukirize
Abawe obulamu obutagwawo
Ayi Mukama gwe owetendo
Ggwe afuga byonna
Buli yenna akukiriza
Awone omuliro.

Chorus: Ffena katusinze ....... x 2

hymns.title: GLORIOUS JESUS KING OF HEAVEN
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Glorious Jesus King of Heaven
Glorious King of Heaven
Glorious Jesus King of Heaven
Glorious King of Heaven
Glorious Jesus King of Heaven
Glorious King of Heaven
Glorious King
Glorious King
Glorious King of Heaven

1. We adore you and praise you.
You are the King of Heaven.
You are the King on Earth.

2. All the Angels praise you.
All the Saints praise you.
All the Faithful praise you.

3. You are the King of every one.
You are the Omnipotent God.
You are the Immortal God

4. You are the King of Angels.
You are the King of Mankind.
You are the King of Disciples.

5. You are the King of Prophets.
You are the King of Creatures
You are the King of Saints.

6. You are the Bread of Life.
You are the Life of Creatures.
You are the Life Everlasting.

7. You are the King of Believers.
You are the King who will Judge us
You are the King who reigns us.

8. You are the King whom we trust.
You are the King of Life.
You are the King too Glorious

hymns.title: GGWE KABAKA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Ggwe Kabaka Omutonzi w’abantu,
Ggwe Kabaka w’ensi zonna ddala!
Ggwe Kabaka! Anti tolemwa kantu,
Ggwe Kabaka! Wonna Ggwe otufuga!
Ggwe Kabaka! Ggwe Kabaka! Ggwe Kabaka!

1. Yezu Kabaka Omutiibwa Ggwe Kabaka waffe,
Ka tukusinze kuba watutonda,
Tulikutenda kuba Ggwe walonda
Okuba naffe, okuba naffe.

2. Yezu Kabaka Omuyinza, Ggwe Kabaka waffe.
Twaali mu buddu, Sitaani omujeemu
Nga y’atutwaala, n’ojja notuzzaamu
Eddembe lyaffe, eddembe lyaffe.

3. Yezu Kabaka Omulungi, Ggwe Kabaka waffe,
Byonna by’osiima tujja kubituusa;
Bamanye bonna nga bwe tutakuusa
Mu mpisa zaffe, mu mpisa zaffe.

4. Yezu Kabaka Omuteefu, Ggwe Kabaka waffe
Tukwesigenga, mbeera watugamba,
Mu ntalo z’ensi bulijjo okuyamba
Emyoyo gyaffe, emyoyo gyaffe.

5. Ggwe Yezu Kabaka waffe, beera empeera yaffe
Oba twegomba nno okubeera naawe,
Ka ebibi byaffe byonna tubikyawe,
Katonda waffe, Katonda waffe.

hymns.title: GWE NGOBERERA MUMANYI
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Gwe ngoberera mumanyi, gwe nzikiriza mumanyi
Katonda Lugaba mumanyi gyali
Gyali Katonda wange mukiriza gyali
Gyali Katonda wange mukiriza nzenna,
Talireka na muwereza we kuvunda,
Emirembe x 2

1. Yani oyo atamanyi Katonda, yani oyo asaasirwe;
Anti mu Katonda mwobeera mwokulira,
Mu Katonda mwotambulira.
Buli lukya Nnamugereka yabukeesa.

2. Yani oyo atamanyi Mutonzi eyajja atambirwe,
Anti mu Katonda mwabeera mwakolera;
Mu Kitaawe ye mwasibuka,
Ye Mwaana, ye Kristu nsinza gwe mmanyi ye Katonda.

3. Nze nsinza Katonda omwagalwa ennyo, Mwoyo oyo atendebwe.
Anti ye Katonda oyo yajja okutugumya,
Nga atuyamba ffe bullijjo.
Mu kuyiga mu kukola mwoyo gw’olina y’akubeera.

4. Ye Ddunda atuusa n’endagaano atuusa buli kimu.
Anti ye Katonda ye Lugaba,
Mwetufunira buli kantu.
Buli sanyu buli nnaku Namugereka y’atunyweeza.

hymns.title: KATONDA AGULUMIZIBWE
hymns.content:
Chorus: Agulumizibwe, Agulumizibwe x 2
1. Katonda  Agulumizibwe, Agulumizibwe.
Katonda  Agulumizibwe, Agulumizibwe.

2. Yezu Kabaka alina obuyinza bwonna mu ggulu ne munsi.

3. Yezu Kabaka eyatonda byonna nga alagira bulagizi byonna
nebibawo.

4. Patri Kabaka eyatuma Mwaana.

5. Mwoyo Mutukirivu Kabaka.

6. Katonda ddala ava mu Katonda ddala.

7. Yezu Kabaka Omugaati Ogw’obulamu.

8. Yezu Kabaka Katonda ow’obuyinza obutakoma.

9. Yezu Kabaka eyawanikibwa ku musalaba olw’okubeera ebibi
byaffe.

10. Yezu Kabaka eyatufirira ku musalaba.

11. Mwoyo Mutukirivu Omuyigiriza.

12. Yezu Kabaka ow’emirembe.

13. Yezu Kabaka Omusumba Omulungi alokola endiga ze.

14. Oyo Katonda ali waggulu ddala ensibuko yekitangala.

15. Ekitangala ekiva mu Kitangala.

16 Mwoyo Mutukirivu Omukubagiza.

17. Mwoyo Katonda ddala eyasibuka mu Katonda ddala.

18. Mwoyo Omutukuza.

19. Mwoyo Katonda ddala atuyigiriza eby’amazima.

20. Mwoyo Katonda ddala oyo ayogera nebiri mu maaso.

21. Myoyo Mutukirivu Omuyigiriza omukulu ennyo.

22. Patri, Mwaana, Mwoyo Mutukirivu. Bagulumizibwe.........

23. Patri Kitawe wa Mwaana.

24. Mwaana asibuka mu Patri.

25. Ne Mwoyo Mutukirivu ow’oluberera.

26. Katonda - Agulumizibwe - Emirembe gyonna x 2

hymns.title: KATONDA LUGABA OGULUMIZIBWE
hymns.content:
Chorus: Katonda Lugaba ogulumizibwe
Katonda Lugaba ogulumizibwe
Katonda Lugaba ogulumizibwe
Ogulumizibwe, emirembe n’emirembe.

1. Ye ggwe alabirira abatonde bonna
Ye ggwe atuwa ddala ebitonde byonna.
Ye ggwe agabirira abatonde bonna.
Ffenna otukkusa weebale, Kitaffe.

2. Ye ggwe alabirira ebisimbe byaffe.
Ye ggwe atubaliza ebirime byaffe.
Ye ggwe afukirira ennimiro zaffe.
Byonna ne bibala......... weebale, Kitaffe.

3. Ye ggwe atufunira evviini ku nsi.
Ye ggwe ameza enngano esimbwa ku nsi.
Ye ggwe atukuumira emmere yaffe.
Ffenna titujula.............weebale, Kitaffe.

4. Ye ggwe atutonnyesa enkuba ku nsi.
Ye ggwe ayasa empola omusana ku nsi.
Ye ggwe eyalagira ebiseera ku nsi,
Bibe nga bimala...........weebale, Kitaffe.

5. Ye ggwe awulugumya amayinja gonna.
Ye ggwe akuluggusa n’emigga gyonna.
Ye ggwe eyalagira amazzi gonna
Wawa we gakoma...... weebale, Kitaffe.

6. Laba tuli babo Katonda waffe.
Laba tuli babo tukwewa ffenna
Ye ggwe gwe twesiga emirembe gyonna
Ffenna ka twebaze weebale, Kitaffe.

hymns.title: KITAFFE ALI MU GGULU
hymns.content:
1. //Kitaffe ali mu ggulu....................Owo buyinza
Erinya lyo litiibwe .......................Owe kitiibwa//
Obwakabaka bwo ........................Bujje
Bujje mu nsi...............................Yonna
Byoyagala bikolebwe mu nsi,
Nga bwe bikolebwa eyo mu ggulu.......Tuwe leero
Tuwe leero emmere yaffe, eyo gyotuwa buli lunaku

2. //Tusonyiwe Kitaffe ........................Ebibi byaffe
Nga naffe bwetusonyiwa..................Abatukola obubi//
Obwakabaka bwo ........................Bujje
Bujje mu nsi...............................Yonna
Byoyagala bikolebwe mu nsi,
Nga bwe bikolebwa eyo mu ggulu.......Tuwe leero
Tuwe leero emmere yaffe, eyo gyotuwa buli lunaku

3. //Totutwala Kitaffe .........................Mu kukemebwa
Naye otulokole..............................Mu bubi bwonna//
Obwakabaka bwo ........................Bujje
Bujje mu nsi...............................Yonna
Byoyagala bikolebwe mu nsi,
Nga bwe bikolebwa eyo mu ggulu.......Tuwe leero
Tuwe leero emmere yaffe, eyo gyotuwa buli lunaku

hymns.title: MIREMBE GWE YEZU KABAKA
hymns.content:
1. Mirembe Ggwe Yezu Kabaka.
Muzadde era Omulokozi
Kabaka waffe, Omusumba
W’abantu bonna abo munsi.

Ekidd: Yezu Kabaka tuwanjaga
Tuyambe tutuuke mu ggulu

2. Ndabirwamu etemagana
Yezu Kabaka omusasizi,
Ekitebe ky’amagezi,
Nsibuko y’essanyu lyaffe.

3. Katonda nnyini buyinza,
Yezu Kabaka omutiibwa
Yezu Kabaka omwesigwa,
Akubagiza abanaku.

4. Mulokozi w’abakristu
Yezu Kabaka omuyinza
Kabaka we ggulu nensi
Tujune ffe abateyinza.

5. Kiddukiro ky’abonoonyi,
Ggwe atuwa enneema zonna
Abaana bo tuzze gyoli,
Tusasire, tukwesiga.

hymns.title: MUJJE MWENNA OKULABA
hymns.content:
1. Mujje mwenna okulaba,
Owekisa omuteefu,
Mujje mwenna okusinza.
Yezu Kabaka omwagalwa.

2. Ekkomi eri bugujja,
Omulyango oggw’eggulu
Oggujjudde okwagala,
Kwe kusinza, Yezu Kabaka.

3. Ggwe Patri mweyesimira,
Omwaana ye yakujjamu,
Mu ggwe n’Omwoyo mwatuula,
Kwe kusinza Yezu Kabaka.

4. Omukwano omulungi,
Oggwe myoyo emirongoofu
Ogusaanidde obuganzi,
Kwe kusinza yezu Kabaka.

5. Eddembe lya banyikira
Okuguma kwa banaku
Essuubi lya bazirika,
Kwe kusinza Yezu Kabaka.

6. Mbabuuza mmwe abakiriza,
Abaganza obutukuvu,
Essanyu lyammwe liva wa?
Kwe kusinza Yezu Kabaka.

7. Munziremu abajulizi,
Mwe abazira mwe abanywevu
Ani yabajjuza amaanyi?
Kwekusinza Yezu Kabaka.

8. Ggwe Omuteefu, ggwe owekisa
Wonna mu nsi ne mu ggulu.
Ofuge emitima gyonna,
Kwe kusinza Yezu Kabaka.

hymns.title: NDI MU KRISTU
hymns.content:
Ekidd: 
Ndi mu Kristu,
Ndi mu Kristu,
Nzikiriza leero ne bulijjo
Nzikiriza leero ne bulijjo.

1. Nkakasa ndi Mwaana wa Katonda
Sitaani ne bibye mbyegaana
Era ate ndi mwaana wa Yezu Kabaka,
Bulijjo ne mirembe gyonna.

2. Nkusinza ggwe oli Mutonzi wange
Ggwe eyatonda ensi n’eggulu,
Nkusinza Ggwe Patri, Ggwe Mwaana we,
Ne Mwoyo Mutukirivu.

3. Edda twali ffuge lya Sitaani,
Mwaana najja natulokola.
Naliwa omutango gw’abonoonyi,
Nga akiriza okutufirira.

4. Njagala n’ebiragiro byonna,
Katonda bye yatutekera;
Mbikwata n’omwoyo omusanyufu,
Mbeera kwe kutuuka mu ggulu.

5. Ndeseeyo okwesiga ebintu byensi,
Kaakano sikyafa ku lumbe,
Era Mwaana ye Mulamuzi
Kitaawe nange ye yantonda.

hymns.title: NDI MU KRISTU, NDI MU KRISTU
hymns.content:
Ekkidd:
Ndi mu Kristu,
Ndi mu Kristu,
Nebaza Katonda
Eyanganza bw’ati.

1. Wantonda nze omuntu
N’onteeka ku nsi eno
N’onkuuma bulijjo
N’ebyo byewampa.

2. Watuma Omwaana wo
Okununula nze
N’onzigyako ebibi
Mu Batismu.

3. Ebiragiro byo
Ebyo nze mbitenda
Anti bitegeeza
Bw’ondabirira.

4. Eklezia mwendi
Erina ebirungi
Omugaati Ogw’Obulamu
Oguntukuza.

5. Obudde bwe bukya
Ne bwe buwungeera
Nkutenda Kagingo
Buli kabanga

6. Mu nnaku mu ssanyu
Siva ku Katonda
Ye nnanyini byonna
Nange ndi wuwe.

7. Nsaasira bwe nsobya
Mpa okubonerera
Ensobi ze ngwamu
Ndyoke ndokoke.

8. Nsuubira bulijjo
Empeera ye ggulu
Mbeere kumpi naawe
Emirembe gyonna.

hymns.title: NNAMUGEREKA KATONDA OMUKUUMI WANGE
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Nnamugereka Katonda omukuumi wange,
Ggwe buggaga bwe nterese,
Biri mu ggwe byonna ebyange,
Ggwe busika bwange.
Mbeerera muyambi, Ggwe aliba empeera yange,
Mukama essuubi ly’abanoonya.
Nnyweza nkuweereze, ontuuse gy’obeera.

1. Jjinja ery’omuwendo erinonyezebwa wonna ye ggwe, Ayi Mukama;
Akusanga aba yesiimye, Ggwe anti entabiro y’ebirungi byonna
Sseegomba bitiibwa bya nsi eno, buggaga n’amasanyu gaayo,
Biyita kkuutwe, Ayi Mukama woli biba kantu ki?

2. Ku bakwemaaliza ye Ggwe ssanyu ye Ggwe eddembe
Ggwe maanyi g’abalwanyi. Abakuweereza olibaweera,
Ggwe ow’obwenkanya, omuzirakisa,
Abakwesiga tebaliswaala.

3. Abakweyuna abo besiimye balimatira, balijula ki?
Balibulwa ki ate abakusenga nga ggwe olina byonna?
Ggwe nnyini byonna, Ggwe ntabiro,
Ensulo y’ebirungi eby’olubeerera.

4. Nnzuuno nno obulamu bwange mbuzza wuwo.
Mukisa kyo Ggwe watonda nnewa Ggwe leero.
Ggwe Nnantalemwa gwe nsinza, Mukama wange,
Nnzuuno nsenza mbe naawe.

5 (a) Ombeereranga kikubagizo; (Tuuti): Ttaala ey’okumulisa mu
makubo gange.
(b) Mu lutalo lw’omu nsi muno onnyambanga .........
N’otandeka kugwa mu mikono gya balabe bange.
(c) Onnyambanga no mukono gwo ogwa ddyo
N’ompa okuwangula ablabe bange
(d) Onywezanga n’enneema yo eteremwa Mukama......
N’onyamba ne nkuweereza
(e) Ng’obw’omu nsi buweddeko ontwalanga gy’obeera...
N’ombalira mu babo.

hymns.title: NNAMUGEREKA WAVA EBINENE
hymns.content:
1. Nnamugereka wava ebinene, tukwebaza nnyo
Katonda waffe......

Ekidd: Byonna Ggwe obituwa tukwesiga nnyo Ddunda
Kitaffe tukwebaza.

2. Nnamugereka ffenna atumanyi, tukwesiga nnyo
Katonda waffe....

3. Wagiwangawo ensi amakula, tukwebaza nnyo
Katonda waffe.......

4. N’ebigirimu byonna obimanyi, tukwebaza nnyo
Katonda waffe.......

5. Wagiwundamu byonna ebinene, tukwebaza nnyo
Katonda waffe.......

6. Byonna by’olaze ku nsi binene, tukwebaza nnyo
Katonda waffe.......

7. Tulabirawa ffenna abalamu, tukwebaza nnyo
Katonda waffe.......

8. Naakugamba ki ampa obulamu, tukwebaza nnyo
Katonda waffe.......

9. N’obuyinza bwo byonna obifuga, tukwebaza nnyo
Katonda waffe.......

10. N’ebimera byonna obikuza, tukwebaza nnyo
Katonda waffe.......

11. N’ebirime byonna obibaza, tukwebaza nnyo
Katonda waffe.......

12. N’omusana nagwo ogutuwa, tukwebaza nnyo
Katonda waffe.......

13. N’enkuba yo nayo ogituwa, tukwebaza nnyo
Katonda waffe.......

14. Nnannyinimu ffenna otulaba, tukwesiga nnyo
Katonda waffe....

15. Owa ebyokulya bonna abanaku, tukwesiga nnyo
Katonda waffe....

16. Ne bamuzibe obawa okulaba, tukwesiga nnyo
Katonda waffe....

17. N’abalira obawa okuwona, tukwesiga nnyo
Katonda waffe....

18. N’abatambula bonna obamanyi, bakwesiga nnyo
Katonda waffe....

19. Tusaba kimu ffenna okulaba, nga bwotubeera
Katonda waffe....

hymns.title: NZE NJA KUYIMBA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Nze nja kuyimba obulamu bwonna.
Nnyimbira Katonda Omukama eyantonda,
Owange nnyini bulamu.

1. Ntendereza ebirungi by’akola – Ye Nnamugereka
Nnondola ebirungi nga nkumu.

2. Kabaka ow’ekitiibwa, tolabwa – Mu bukulu bwo.
Osinga balubaale – Tokirwa.

3. Enyanja n’ensi yabikola – Ng’abiteekawo.
Tumusinze eyatutonda ffe nnyini.

4. Ggwe tutwale, Kabaka ow’ekisa – Ng’otulambika
Otutuuse, otuwe ekiwummulo.

hymns.title: OMUKAMA ANNUNDA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Omukama annunda, mpawo kyenjula,
Y’antwala mu malundiro amalungi, ne ngalamira.

1. Yantwala eri amazzi gye mba mpummulira nze.
Omwoyo gwange yaguzzaamu endasi.

2. Yampisa mu bukubo obugolokofu.
Olw’okubeera eryinya lye eryo.

3. Ne bwe nnaatambulira mu kiwonvu ekikutte enzikiza.
Sitya kabenje kuba ggwe oli nange.

4. Wantegekera olujjuliro nze.
Ng’abalabe bange batunula.

5. Omutwe gwange ogusiiga omuzigo.
Ekikompe kyange ne kibooga.

6. Ekisa n’omukwano gwo bingoberere.
Ennaku zonna ezo bulamu bwange.

7. Nneegomba okusula mu nju y’Omukama
Emirembe n’ennaku.

hymns.title: TUKULAMUSIZA
hymns.content:
1. Tukulamusiza
Kitaffe owekisa,
Tukuvunamidde
Tukwewombekedde X 2

2. Abaana abawere
Tubakukwasiza
Obawambatire
Obaleze ekisa X 2

3. Era abavubuka
Nabo basasire.
Bonna banyiikire
Mu bulungi bwonna. X 2

4. Abakulu nabo
Bakowola gy’oli
Obasseeko omwoyo
Bakusaba bingi X 2

5. Bewatuyisamu
Tobeerabiranga
Batukumirenga
Mu bukadde bwabwe X 2

6. Abanakuwadde
Wamu n’abalwadde
Obajjukiranga
N’obakubagiza X 2

7. Aboonoonyi nabo
Obasasirenga
Bonna beekomeko
Babonererenga X 2

8. Olunaku lukye
Atenga lwa ssanyu
Lwetuliba nawe
Mu bwa Kabaka bwo X 2

hymns.title: TUKUTENDEREZA NGA TUKUYIMBIRA
hymns.content:
Ekidd: 
Tukutendereza, nga tukuyimbira
Ave Yezu Kabaka
Ave Yezu Kabaka

1. Ayi Yezu Kabaka
Ggwe Katonda waffe
Mulyango gwe ggulu
Tukulamusiza

2. Siima ennamusa yaffe,
Evudde mu mwoyo
Tunyweze mu ddembe
Tuteme mu nvuba.

3. Abazibi b’amaaso
Bawe balabenga
Ebibi byaffe byonna
Bitunaabuleko

4. Weyolese nga bwoli
Kitaffe atwagala ennyo
Katonda omwesigwa
Tufuule abateefu.

5. Tuyiseenga bulungi
Nga twegendereza
Tukusanyusenga
Mu ebyo byotwagaza

6. Patri Ggwe omuzadde
N’omwaana gw’ozaala
Mutendebwe mwenna
Ne Mwoyo Mutukirivu.

hymns.title: TUKWEWADDE LEERO YEZU KABAKA
hymns.content:
Ekidd: 
Tukwewadde leero, Yezu Kabaka
Tubeere ku bubwo, ennaku zonna.

1. Tukukwasiza
Emibiri gyaffe
Era n’emyoyo gyaffe
Yezu Kabaka.

2. Tukukwasiza
Ebikolwa byaffe
N’ebirowoozo byaffe
Yezu Kabaka.

3. Tukukwasiza
Okwesiima kwaffe
Era n’ennaku zaffe
Yezu Kabaka.

4. Tukukwasiza
Olugendo lwaffe
Otukulemberenga
Yezu Kabaka.

5. Tukukwasiza
Obulamu bwaffe
Otulabirirenga
Yezu Kabaka

6. Ku lwekisa kyo
Tutwale mu ggulu
Kyetukusaba leero
Ffe abaana bo.

7. Yezu Kabaka
Otaase abaana bo
Omulabe Sitaani
Nemitego gye.

8. Yezu Kabaka
Tusaba abaana bo
Otusonyiwe ebibi
Ayi Kitaffe

9. Yezu Kabaka
Gyetunagendanga
Titukwerabirenga
Ayi Kabaka.

hymns.title: TUSIMBE FFENNA MU KISINDE
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Tusimbe ffenna mu kisinde,
Kya mukama waffe Yezu Kabaka,
Tulimulaba mu Ggulu lye,
Wamu n’abatukirivu. x 2

1. Ku lwa Batismu twalagaana
Okuleka amasitaani,
Twegaana n’ebikolwa byonna
Ebitusuula mu bubi.

2. Yezu Kabaka era tukulagaanya,
Okukwaata Evanjili yo,
N’okwebengula ku musemya,
Omanye, nga tuli babo.

3. Yezu Kabaka oli Katonda waffe,
Wekka wekka gwe twagala,
Obeerenga Mukama waffe,
Leero n’emirembe gyonna.

hymns.title: TWALA BYONNA BYE NNINA
hymns.content:
1. Mu mikono gyo, Ayi Mukama, mwentadde omwoyo gwange
Sibuula ...........Omuddu wo agende kati
Sibuula............Omuddu wo agende mirembe x 2

Chorus: Twaala byonna bye nnina. Twaala byonna byennina.
Twaala omutima gugwo, twaala, twaala,
Twaala Lugaba byonna bye nnina.

2. Mu buyinza bwo, Ayi Mukama, mwe ntadde essuubi lyange
Sibuula ...........Omuddu wo agende kati
Sibuula............Omuddu wo agende mirembe x 2

3. Mu magezi go, Ayi Mukama, mwe ntadde omwoyo gwange
Sibuula ...........Omuddu wo agende kati
Sibuula............Omuddu wo agende mirembe x 2

4. Nze mba mugumu, Ayi Mukama, ggwe bwoba mu mwoyo gwange
Sibuula ...........Omuddu wo agende kati
Sibuula............Omuddu wo agende mirembe x 2

5. Mu mikono gyo, Ayi Mukama, mwe nzigya eddembe lyange,
Sibuula ...........Omuddu wo agende kati
Sibuula............Omuddu wo agende mirembe x 2

6. Abakumanyi, Ayi Mukama, mu byonna bakwesiga sso,
Sibuula ...........Omuddu wo agende kati
Sibuula............Omuddu wo agende mirembe x 2

7. Okuzukira, Ayi Mukama, nze bwe nfa nkulindiridde,
Sibuula ...........Omuddu wo agende kati
Sibuula............Omuddu wo agende mirembe x 2

hymns.title: TWESIIMA MU NSI
hymns.content:
1. Twesiima munsi, tuguma mu nnaku,
Nga tulowooza, ng’empeera lye ggulu.
Gyetulyesiima, emirembe gyonna,
Ewa Katonda.

2. Katonda Patri, Katonda Mwaana,
Katonda Mwoyo Mutukirivu,
Tukutendereza Ggwe Katonda wekka,
Emirembe gyonna.

3. Ave Patri, Ave Mwaana,
Ave Mwoyo Mutukirivu,
Tukulamusiza Ggwe afuga eggulu
N’ensi yonna.

4. Mwaana ava mu Patri, tukutendereza,
Tukugulumiza, tukuwa ekitiibwa,
Kubanga wekka Ggwe Kabaka
Owe mirembe.

5. Mwe Abatukirivu nga mutemagana,
Muli ne Yezu Kabaka omuganzi wammwe,
Nga musanyuka nga bwe mujaguza,
Owa! Mwesiimye.

6. Yezu Kabaka eyava mu ggulu,
Tukukiriza era tukwesiga.
Ggwe Mugaati Ogw’obulamu
Ffe ggwe tulya.

7. Katonda Mwaana aleeta obulamu,
Nga otuzukiza notuzza obujja,
Otuwa obuyinza obw’okukusinza.
Aaah! Twesiimye.

8. Yezu Kabaka, Katonda waffe,
Tukusaba otuwe eggulu,
Era otuwe ebirungi byonna,
Ebyo mubiri.

9. Ggwe Katonda Mwaana, tukwekutte ffenna,
Otuwanguze otufuule babo
Ggwe wamma ffenna tukutendereze,
Emirembe gyonna.

hymns.title: YEZU KABAKA LAGIRA FUGA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Yezu Kabaka lagira fuga,
Ffenna tuli babo,
Gaziya ate engoma yo
Otwale ensi yonna.

1. Nandibadde nga abantu bangi
Bakugaana nga Katonda,
Ffe nno Ayi Yezu Kabaka Mulokozi,
Tukwatula nga Kabaka.

2. Wazalibwa mu nsi ng’omuntu,
Ekitiibwa n’okikisa.
So emirembe gyonna mu ggulu,
Watuulanga nga Kabaka.

3. Abantu abe ggwanga lyo bonna,
Mu kibuga ku matabi,
Baakowola n’essanyu lingi,
Nti Hossana Yezu Kabaka.

4. Abalabe bo bakwegaana,
Baakutwala ewa Pilato,
So naye ku musalaba gwo,
Yawandiika nti Kabaka.

5. Ng’otudde ku ddyo ogwa Kitaawo,
Abamalayika bonna,
Bakusinza mu kitiibwa kyo
Ne bayimba nti Kabaka

hymns.title: YEZU KABAKA, YEZU KABAKA, OMUTEEFU DDALA
hymns.content:
Chorus: Yezu Kabaka, Yezu Kabaka, Omuteefu ddala.

Kye nkusaba, kwe kumanya obuteefu bwo (x 2).

Singa nange njagala nnyo obuteefu bwo. (x 2)

Nneegomba nnyo okufaanana obuteefu bwo. (x 2).

Twagalanenga bulijjo emirembe gyonna. (x 2).

hymns.title: YEZU KABAKA OWE MIREMBE
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Yezu Kabaka, Yezu Kabaka,
Yezu Kabaka owe mirembe,
Owebwe ekitiibwa

1. Yezu Kabaka, Katonda waffe,
Tukwebaza okutulonda.

2. Yezu Kabaka tumwagalenga,
Kubanga yatununula.

3. Yezu Kabaka tumuwe ekitiibwa,
Kubanga lye teeka lya Patri.

4. Yezu Kabaka atwagala ennyo,
Ye Musumba omulungi.

5. Yezu Kabaka Katonda waffe
Era ggwe Mulamuzi.

6. Yezu Kabaka oli wa mazima.
Akwagala omwagala.

7. Yezu Kabaka akukiriza,
Nebwalifa aliba mulamu.

8. Yezu Kabaka eyava mu ggulu,
Ggwe Mugaati ogw’obulamu.

9. Yezu Kabaka omulungi ennyo.
Tukusaba otusasire.

10. Yezu Kabaka afuga amawanga,
Erinya lyo litiibwe.

11. Yezu Kabaka abakukiriza,
Tukwatula Ggwe Kabaka.

12. Yezu Kabaka nnyini buteefu,
Ggwe nsibuko ye mirembe.

13. Yezu Kabaka nnyini buyinza,
Bwonna mu ggulu ne munsi.

14. Yezu Kabaka Katonda waffe,
Ggwe wekka asonyiwa ebibi.

15. Yezu Kabaka ffe tukusinza
Kubanga oli Katonda.

16.Yezu Kabaka Ggwe oli Kitaffe,
Katonda atagwawo.

hymns.title: ABALAMAZI MUJJE TULYE ENTANDA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Abalamazi mujje tulye entanda.
Abalamazi mujje tulye,
Ku mugaati gw’Obulamu.......Kristu Yezu Kabaka.
Ku mbaga ye atuyita..............ffenna
Ku kijjulo...........................Kristu Yezu Kabaka
Kye kijjulo eky’obulamu obw’olubeerera.

1. Mujje abange mujje, mulye ku mugaati guno,
munywenga evvini eno bwe bulamu obw’olubeerera.

2. Mujje mbayita mujje, ku kijjulo kye nfumbye.
Alya ennyama yange, alya ntanda ya bulamu obw’olubeerera.

3. Bajjajjamwe baalya mmanu mu ddungu, kyokka baafa.
Wabula guno ggwe Mugaati gw’obulamu obw’olubeerera.

4. Alya ennyama yange mbeera mu ye, anywa omusaayi gwange
Mbeera mu ye naye mu nze. ndimuzuukiza ku lw’oluvanyuma.

5. Ka tulye ennyama yo, ffe abakumanyi ka tunywe omusaayi gwo.
Ffe abakumanyi Ggwe Mukama olituzuukiza ku lw’oluvanyuma.

6. Ffenna twesiga abakumanyi, ffenna tukakakasa nga abakunywererako
Ggwe Omukama olituzuukiza ku lw’oluvanyuma.

hymns.title: JAGUZA YIMBA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Jaguza yimba, ayi mwoyo gwange anti Omulokozi wo
Yezu Kabaka yaakukyalidde
Jaguza yimba, ayi mwoyo gwange anti Omulokozi wo
Yezu Kabaka ye mugenyi wo olwa leero

1. Jangu Yezu Kabaka nkwaniriza.
Jangu ewange n’otuula.
Onjagala nnyo Mukama wange,
Omwoyo gwange ka gubenga ennyumba yo.

2. Leero Yezu Kabaka lw’otuuse,
Leero Kristu nsanyuse nnyo;
Ggwe omuzira kisa Mukama wange,
Ozze okubiita omubi nze atagasa.

3. Bwoba nange nsanyuka nnyo,
Bwobulawo ate ne ndaaga
Omuzigu oli kafulu Sitaani
Ankwenyakwenya agutwale omwoyo.

4. Y’ani nno oyo atamatidde,
Y’ani oyo nno atamulidde
Ffe abamulidde Mukama waffe
Annatuyamba atutuuze ntende.

5. Jangu nno ggwe eyetegese
Jangu omutwale tomusubwa
Ng’omwaniriza mu nnyumba yo ggwe
Anakuyamba akuwenga eddembe.

6. Byonna biibyo mbizza wuwo,
Nzenna Yezu Kabaka nfuuse wuwo;
Ggwe atansudde Mukama wange,
Leero nkugamba ka nfubenga mbe wuwo.

7. Byonna Yezu Kabaka bidda wuwo
Ye Ggwe Kabaka nnanyini byo;
Abatakumanyi olw’ekisa kyo nabo
Obanoonya obooleke ekkubo lyo.

hymns.title: KATONDA WANGE OMWAGALWA
hymns.content:
1. Katonda wange omwagalwa,
Ggwe essanyu buli wantu.
Buli kye nnoonya okindaga,
Seetaagenga na kantu
Onyamba nga ngwa mu kabi,
Kitange nnaakuweera ki?
Laba bwe ndaaga obwavu.

2. Bwenfunye Yezu Kabaka, twegasse.
Olwo nfuuse muganzi.
Ensi n’ebyayo mbidduse.
Bisuula bangi ennganzi
Ekkubo lyokka eryandagwa,
Yezu Kabaka, kwe ndinywerera
Era sirimuvaako.

3. Yezu Kabaka ekkubo eddunngamu
Annyweza buli bbanga,
Ekkula, omubalagavu.
Bajjajja gwe baalanga
Ankuuma ndi kuteera ki?
Ka omwoyo ngudduse awabi,
Enneema ze mba nnyeza

hymns.title: KA TUGENDE
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Ka tugende, ku mbaga y’Omukama atuyita.
Yezu Kabaka atwagala,
Yezu Kabaka, atwagala nnyo.

1. Musumba owange gwe ntenda.
Musumba owange y’annunda
Wuuno omuliisa ow’ekitalo.

2. Mu ddundiro eyo gy’antwala
Annambira eyo ng’andiisa
Awali ebirungi eby’ekitalo.

3. Erinnya lye nze lye ntenda
Annambika, Omukama antwala,
Nange kati nno nneesiima.

4. Anaatutiisa oyo y’ani?
Mukama waffe nga ali awo
Yezu Kabaka atuliisa ye atalemwa

5. Ekijjulo ekyo kyategese,
Nga n’omubi omulabe ali awo,
Yezu Kabaka atuliisa ye atumala.

6. Ansiiga k’omuzigo ku mutwe,
Ayooyoota nze, annywesa,
Ekyange ekikompe kijjudde.

7. Ono ddala Omukama ye omu
Ansimbako eriiso eddungi.
Anti ekisa kye y’akigira.

8. Mu nnyumba yo, Mukama mbeere,
Nga sigivaamu, mbeere omwo
Ssebo omulungi, ompe emikisa.

hymns.title: KA TUSANYUKE
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Ka tusanyuke ffenna ababatize.
Yezu Kabaka bayise ffenna ffe ku mbaga ye.
Tulifa lumu kyokka tuliva emagombe eri
n’obuwanguzi.
Nnyini bulamu ffenna alituzuukiza.

1. Nze kuzukira; anzikiriza ne bwalifa,
aliba mulamu. Yezu Kabaka y’akigamba!

2. Nze kuzuukira, angoberera ndiba naye,
Nga mmuzuukiza, ndijja nze mmutwale.

3. Yezu Kabaka gw’ofunye, kyakulya ddala tomwewala.
Y’alikulamya! Yezu kabaka bwe yagamba!

4. Yezu Kabaka gw’ofunye, kyakunywa ddala tube naye
Wa lubeerera, bwatyo bwe yagamba!

5. Yezu Kabaka gw’ofunye, ye muganzi wo alizuukiza
Abamumanyi! Bwatyo bwe yagamba!

6. Yezu Kabaka gw’ofunye, ggwe musuubize, okuva kati
Oli muddu we! Nyweza bye yagamba.

hymns.title: KRISTU OMUKAMA ALI WANO
hymns.content:
A) Kristu Omukama ali wano muffe ke kaliga
Ke kaliga, Ke Kaliga, Ke kaliga ka Katonda x 2.
Omukama wa byonna Kristu Paska yaffe atambiddwa.

B) Omubiri gwa Kristu Omukama....... Oo Kristu paska yaffe
Y’oyo ddala eyewaayo atambiddwa.......
Omusaayi gwa Kristu Omukama.... Oo Kristu Paska yaffe
Y’oyo ddala eyewaayo atambiddwa..

1. Amiina kya mazima ali wano eyewaayo.
Omukama ke Kaliga ali wano atambiddwa... Oo Kristu Paska (B)
Kristu Omukama ali wano muffe ke Kaliga (A).........

2. Ababatize be baabo Omulokozi b’aliisa.
Be yalonda basse kimu mu Kristu atusembezza....Oo Kristu (B)...
Kristu Omukama ali wano muffe ke Kaliga (A)..........

3. Enyama ye abagirya Omukama abeera mu bo. Omusaayi ggwe
abagunywa okufa kwe bakukuza nnyo......Oo Kristu (B)....
Kristu Omukama ali wano muffe ke Kaliga (A)..........

C) Wuuno, Kristu akaliga, Wuuno.......... Wuuno.
Alinze, Kristu akaliga alinze............... Alinze.
Sembera ofune omubiri gwa Kristu ng’olya akaliga
Sembera ofune omugabo gwa Kristu ng’olya akaliga.
Tumwebaze Lugaba, tumwebaze Ddunda,
Yezu Kabaka ono atufuula abazira,
Yezu Kabaka ono nga tulamaga ku nsi (x 2).

ii) Atweewa Kristu akaliga atweewa......Atweewa.
Tumweewe Kristu akaliga tumweewe.....Tumweewe.
Sembera ofune omubiri gwa Kristu ng’olya akaliga
Sembera ofune omugabo gwa Kristu ng’olya akaliga.
Tumwebaze Lugaba, tumwebaze Ddunda..........(C),
Yezu Kabaka ono atufuula abazira,
Yezu Kabaka ono nga tulamaga ku nsi (x 2).

iii) Tweyanze Kristu Akaliga atwewa.... Tweyanze
Mulungi Kristu akaliga atweewa..... Mulungi
Sembera ofune omubiri gwa Kristu ng’olya akaliga
Sembera ofune omugabo gwa Kristu ng’olya akaliga...(C)
Tumwebaze Lugaba, tumwebaze Ddunda,
Yezu Kabaka ono atufuula abazira,
Yezu Kabaka ono nga tulamaga ku nsi (x 2).

hymns.title: MAZIMA NEEGOMBA NNYO
hymns.content:
Ekidd: 
Mazima neegomba nnyo mmutuuke eyantonda
Eyo mu ggulu nange mmutuukeko, aa
Nja kunyiikirira nnyo okukola by’andagira,
Ka nfunvubire, lulikya ne ntuuka.

1. Neegombera ddala mbeere owa Katonda wange....  Neegombera
Kiwamirembe Lugaba atwesiimya    ddala

2. Neesungira ddala okutuuka mu ggulu.....    Neesungira ddala
Ewa Katonda wange oli eyantonda. 
3. Eri wa ggulu awaladde abalungi beesiima...,  Beesiima
Oyo Kiwamirembe Lugabatabajuza. 
4. Abali mu ggulu baawaayo obulamu bwabwe..... Abali mu ggulu
Nange neewaddeyo ew’Omukama.
5. Nange ng’onnyambye, Mukama nja kusobola......Mukama nja kusobola
Kiwamirembe lugaba, tonsuula.

hymns.title: MIREMBE OMUKAMA, AYI YEZU KABAKA OMWAGALWA
hymns.content:
1. Mirembe Omukama
Ayi Yezu Kabaka omwagalwa.
Siyinza kwogera,
Leero nkusinze ntya?
Mujje mwe ba Malayika,
Namwe Banna Ggulu mwenna,
Tusinzize wamu,
Nnyini butukuvu.

2. Ayi Yezu Kabaka nkwebaza
Ku lw’okunkyalira
Leero nkweyanze ntya,
Nga bwe kisaanira?
Essanyu limbuganye nnyo ,
Nga nekkanya ebitone byo.
Onyambye weebale!
Wamma ggwe onsaasidde!

3. Nkusanyuse naki?
Laba bwendi bwendi!
Ebyange ze nsobi,
Nsale magezi ki?
Manyi nnefuule omuddu wo,
Ka nnywere mubusenze bwo.
Bwentyo nkwewongere,
Nga ggwe bwonewadde.

4. Nnyweza ne neema yo,
Nkwate ebiragiro.
Gumya eklezia wo,
Akuume abaana bo.
Aboononyi bakomyewo,
Gyoli ayi Yezu Kabaka.
Tuwe emirembe gyo,
Nensa mumirimo.

5. Kabaka Omutiibwa,
Mugaati gwe ggulu,
Tuwe obunyiikivu,
Nensa mu mirimu.
Ggwe entanda ya batambula,
Ggwe ndasi za bazirika.
Ggwe ddaala ettukuvu,
Tulinyise eggulu.

hymns.title: MUGGULEWO YEZU KABAKA ATUUSE
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Muggulewo, muggulewo Yezu Kabaka atuuse,
Ayingire, ayingire mu mitima egyamwe,
Nesiimye leero nange,
Okukyaaza nze Omulokozi x 2

1. Mulabe amageero, Katonda Mwaana,
Mulabe amageero, okujja omwange,
Nze ani nze gwokyalidde,
Nze ani nze nange omwolo

2. Oh Kristu gwe Katonda,
Oh Kristu otwagala,
Oh. Kristu ggwe Omukama,
Nsiimye nnyo okugya ewange

3. Laba obuyinza, bwenfunye nze,
Okukyaza, Omutonzi we ggulu.
Sso nga nze sisanidde,
Leero nange nesiimye.

4. Oh Mukama ggwe Katonda
Leero nange akukyazizza
Nze nfuuse nyumba yo kati
Nsiimye nnyo okujja omwange.

hymns.title: MUJJE MMWE ABAYALA
hymns.content:
Chrorus: 
Mujje mmwe abayala
Mujje tugende ewa Yezu Kabaka
Mujje mmwe abayala
Mujje tugende ffe atujuna

1. Tuli babo, Yezu Kabaka owaffe Ggwe omuzira ......FFe abayala
Tuli babo, Yezu Kabaka owaffe tukwesiga.

2. Tuzze wamu, tuwe ebirungi eby’obulamu;
Tuzze wamu, tuwe ebirungi tukwesiga. „

3. Tussa kimu, Yezu Kabaka owaffe, otwagala
Tussa kimu, Yezu Kabaka owaffe tulunngamye. „

4. Tuzze wamu, Yezu Kabaka owaffe otujuna
Tuzze wamu, Yezu Kabaka owaffe tulunngamye. „ 

5. Tuzze kulya, tuwe omubiri gwo ogw’obulamu
Tuzze wuwo, tuwe ebirungi tukwesiga. „

6. Tuli babo, Yezu Kabaka owaffe, tuzze wamu,
Tuzze wamu, Yezu Kabaka owaffe, otubbule. „

7. Tuzze kunywa, tuwe omusaayi gwo ogw’obulamu,
Tuzze wuwo, tuwe ebirungi, tukwesiga. „

8. Otwagala, Yezu Kabaka owaffe, otwagala,
Tusazewo, Yezu Kabaka owaffe okukwesiga. „

9. Otwagala, Yezu Kabaka Omukama, otwagala,
Tusazewo, Yezu Kabaka owaffe okukwesiga „

10. Tukwesiga nnyo, Yezu Kabaka owaffe, otuzuukiza,
Tukwesiga nnyo, Yezu Kabaka owaffe tukwesiga.

11. Tuli babo, Yezu Kabaka owaffe, tuli babo
Tuli babo Yezu Kabaka owaffe, tuwanguze.

hymns.title: NZE ANI AKOWOOLWA!
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Nze ani akowoolwa,
Nze ani akyaliddwa,
Nze ani asembezebwa leero,
Ku mbaga yo Mukama!

1. Katwambuke abayite bo Mukama
Entanda etuuse.
Musagambize bayise kati,
Mwenna abetegese.

2. Obuyinza bwenfunye kati
Leero buli nani?
Okukyaaza Omutonzi we ggulu,
Era ndi mu ggulu.

3. Ali njagala nga bwonjagala,
Leero asangwa wa?
Ggwe wawayo n’obulamu bwo,
Lwa kunjagala nnyo.

4. Alinzijja kugwe Mukama,
Leero kiriba ki?
Oba kufa ndikufirira,
Nngende gyobeera.

5. Nze nkyensaba ayi Mukama,
Ggwe azze olwaleero,
Ombeeremu emirembe gyonna,
Ontwale gyobeera.

6. Omugaati gwe nfunye kati
Guno guli nani?
Okukyaza Omutonzi we ggulu,
Nange ndi mu ggulu.

hymns.title: NZUUNO NKONKONA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Nzuuno ku mulyango nkonkona,
Awulira eddoboozi lyange naggulawo ndiyingira ewuwe.
Nzuuno ku mulyango nkonkona
Awulira eddoboozi lyange naggulawo ndiyingira ewuwe.
Nendya ekyekiro nga tutudde wamu,
Nendya ebyassava nga tuli ffembi tutudde wamu.

1. Mpulira ayogera nga Mukama wange, nsanyuse nannyo Yezu Kabaka
lwogobye.
Mpulira ayogera nga ggwe Mukama wange, yingira jjangu, Mukama
wange, yingira jjangu nze nkwagala.
Yingira jjangu, Mukama wange, yingira tuula tubeere wamu.

2. Mukama nkumanyi nga bwoli ow’ekitiibwa, nsanyuse nannyo
okuntunulira.
Weebale okujja gyendi Mukama wange, yingira jjangu, Mukama
wange, yingira jjangu nze nkwagala.
Yingira jjangu, Mukama wange, yingira tuula tubeere wamu.

3. Mpulira annamusa nga Mukama wange, nsanyuse nannyo Yezu
Kabaka ankyalidde.
Weebale okujja gyendi Mukama wange, yingira jjangu, Mukama
wange, yingira jjangu nze nkwagala.
Yingira jjangu, Mukama wange, yingira tuula tubeere wamu.

4. Mukama nsonyiwa anti nasobya bingi, neebaza lwoze anti onsasira.
Mukama ndayira nange okunywera kugwe, yingira jjangu, Mukama
wange, yingira jjangu nze nkwagala.
Yingira jjangu, Mukama wange, yingira tuula tubeere wamu.

hymns.title: OMUGAATI GWA BAMALAYIKA
hymns.content:
Ekidd: 
Omugaati gwa Bamalayika guugwo
Omugaati gwa Bamalayika guugwo
Ogwava mu Ggulu, gwegwo,
Atagwagala ani?

1. Twejjukize ku bigambo bya Yezu Kabaka
Bye yakuutira abatume be n’abayigirizwabe
Nti omubiri gwange, kya kulya ddala
N’omusaayi gwange kya kunywa ddala.

2. Katonda yatuwa amaanyi era ffe y’atunyweeza
Tuleme kugwa mu mitego!
Tujjumbire okufuna naffe ku Mugaati Ogw’Obulamu
Yezu Kabaka mw’atwegabulira.

3. Twekkanye obuyinza bwa Yezu Kabaka
Eyatuula ku mmeeza n’agabula bulungi
Nagamba abatume okumulyanga
Bafune obulamu.

4. Emyoyo gya kitiibwa egyo egifuna Katonda
Yagiyamba ne mu lutalo.
Mugaati gwa muwendo guno twesige Katonda
Yezu Kabaka mw’atwegabulira.

5. Omukama ye mubeezi w’abanaku
Eyafirira ensi eno n’agiwonya na bingi
Mu Mugaati gwaffe ye Mulokozi
Omuyambi waffe, atuwa engabo.

6. Abantu tweyune obulamu, Yezu Kabaka y’abuleeta.
Omulabe talitumenya!
Eddembe lya kunoonya awo
W’olaba Katonda, mirembe na nnaku talitubulako.

hymns.title: OMUGAATI GW’OBULAMU
hymns.content:
Chorus: Omugaati gw’obulamu, ogwava mu ggulu,
Gugwo wuuno – Ye Yezu Kabaka,
Gugwo wuuno – Ye Yezu Kabaka,
Ogwa batambuze, ye nyini bulamu,
Yezu Kabaka afuuse ntanda.

1. Tweyanziza Seebo omulungi,
Yezu Kabaka okutwewa.           Oyambye!
Tweyanziza                                  Oyambye!                     
Tweyanziza Ssebo okutwewa ggwe.
2. Twesiimye nnyo Ssebo gwe owaffe
Ssebo okutwewa                         Nga ojja eno
Twesiimye nnyo                           Ewaffe
Twesiimye nnyo, Ssebo okuba naawe. 

3. Mwe abayala namwe abayonta
Namwe abagonvu                        Mujje eyo.
Ewa nnyini bulamu                       Ye Yezu Kabaka
Abakuse nnyo nnyini abawe amaanyi. 

4. Tukwesiga nnyo Ssebo tutwale
Ssebo otutuuse                             Eka eyo.
Gyobeera                                        Mu kitiibwa
Tukwesiga nnyo Ssebo tutuuse eyo! 

5. Ewa Kitaawo Ssebo tutwale
Ssebo otutuuse                             Twesiime.
N’abamutenda                               Mu kitiibwa.
Banaggulu, naffe no tube mwabo.

hymns.title: OZZE OMWANGE
hymns.content:
Ekidd:
1. Ozze omwange – Neyanzizza
Onkyalidde - Neyanzizza
Nga nnesiimye! – Nneyanzizza neyanzege Yezu Kabaka
onkyalidde.

2. Onewadde
Wenna Yezu Kabaka
Nga nnesiimye!

3. Ondetedde
Ebirungi ebyo
Nze by’ennetaaga

4. Obutafa obwo
Obumpadde
Nga nnesiimye!

5. Byonna ebirungi
Obimpadde
Nga nnesiimye!

6. Bamalayika abo
Bonna mbasinga
Nga nnesiimye!

7. Omwoyo ggwange
Kati nnyumba yo
Oh! Togivaamu!

8. Obulamu bwange
Mbukuwadde
Nkusaba buteefu.

9. Ompe amaanyi
Nnwanyise Sitaani
Omulabe wange

10. Nkutuukeko eyo
Ewa Kitaawo
Nnesiime naawe!

hymns.title: TUJJAGUZE
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Tujjaguze tukube olube,
Tuyimbe ffenna n’essanyu,
Yezu Kabaka azze wano ewaffe,
Tumusinze ffenna wamu. x 2

1. Yezu Kabaka gwe oli Kitaffe,
Gwe mulokoozi wabantu,
Gwe oli ssanyu lye myoyo gyaffe,
Ng’otudde mu ffe abaana bo. x 2

2. Mukama wange nga nkwagala,
Mpaku mugaati ogwo bulamu,
Ngulyenga mukukwagala,
Era nemu kukiriza x 2

3. Yezu Kabaka gwe mugaati gw’obulamu,
Omutuviira obutafa,
Gw’oli mmere ddala y’abantu bonna,
Emirembe ne mirembe. x 2

4. Yezu Kabaka mu ggulu eyo,
Abantu gyoli bateeka,
Ngomazze okubasonyiwa,
Ebibi byonna bye balina. x 2

5. Yezu Kabaka, kino kyetusaaba,
Tusasire ebibi byonna,
Byetukola buli lunnaku,
Tulyooke tube baana bo. x 2

hymns.title: TUSINZE YEZU KABAKA
hymns.content:
1. Tusinze Yezu Kabaka,
Omugaati gw’obulamu,
Ye mmere y’omuggulu,
Ge mmanyi bwebulamu.

2. Mwaana ngaatwagala nnyo,
Yagaana okutuvako,
Kyekimuleta leero,
Tumulyenga bulijjo.

3. Yagamba abatume be,
Alya omubiri gwange,
Nanywa omusaayi gwange
Talifa nga bajjajja.

4. Tiwakyaali Mugaati,
Gufuuse mubiri gwe,
N’eviini mu kikompe,
Efuuse musaayi gwe.

5. Tolaba kikoledwa,
Kiriza bukiriza,
Amaaso togesiga,
Ye Yezu Kabaka ddala.

6. Buli lwojja okufuna,
Omugaati ogw’obulamu,
Weggata ne Katonda,
N’ojjula n’obulamu.

7. Yezu Kabaka anjagala ennyo
Kankufune bulijjo,
Bwoba nange kakaano,
Mu ggulu tolinvaako.

hymns.title: TUUTUNO FFENNA
hymns.content:
Ekidd: 
Tuutuno ffenna tukuyimbira
Essanyu lyaffe Yezu Kabaka;
Mu buyinza bwo otukuumenga
N’otunyweeza mu kwagala.

1. Ayi Mwoyo gw’ange
Tokoowa kuyimba
Oluyimba lwaffe
Olw’okwagala.

2. Yezu Kabaka ow’ekitiibwa
Kabaka Ggwe wuuyo
Eyava mu Ggulu
Okutulokola.

3. Ggwe nnannyini buteefu
Olw’obuyinza bwo
Otuwa bulijjo
Obulamu bwo.

4. Ne mu kwagala kwo
Otuwa obulamu
Nga ku Kalvariyo
Watufirira

5. Tuwe obuyinza bwo
N’obutukuvu bwo
Ne tubeera babo
Nga tukwagala.

6. Yezu Kabaka Ggwe Katonda
Ffenna tukusinza
Ggwe Kabaka waffe
Nnyini bulamu.

7. Tukutendereza
Mu bulamu bwaffe
Ne mu Ggulu ffenna
Tulikwagala.

hymns.title: TWANIRIZE KRISTU OMUGENYI OMUKULU
hymns.content:
Chorus: Twanirize Kristu omugenyi omukulu
Ali kati mu ffe wano
O! Kyamagero kikulu nnyo,
Yezu Kabaka okujja n’abeera mu ffe, n’afaanana nga ffe
Azze Omusumba Omulungi alambudde endiga ze,
Azze, azze, azze, atuliise.

1. Tukwanirizza Kristu, Kristu Ggwe Kabaka waffe. (Tulabira wa?
...(x 3)
Omwagalwa omutiibwa o’wekisa, omuteefu (Tulabira wa?)

2. Tukwebaza nnyo kristu, Kristu otuwe ggwe byonna.(Tulabira wa?)
Eby’eggulu abireese ka naffe twenyweze.

3. Tunakuwa ki Kristu, ffe nno abankuseere.
Kiki ddala ekirungi ku bwaffe?

4. Tukwekola nnyo Kristu, Kristu Ggwe atugatta ffenna.
Ow’ekisa tunyweze ffe mu ggwe tugumenga.

5. Tukwagala nnyo Kristu, Kristu Ggwe Omusumba waffe.
Ffe abantu bo tutwale tulambike otunyweze.

6. Tukwesiga nnyo Kristu, Kristu Ggwe omulungi waffe.
Kulembera otutwale, tuwanguze otutuuse.

hymns.title: YEZU KABAKA NNANNYINI KISA
hymns.content:
Ekidd: 
Yezu Kabaka nnannyini kisa,
Omugaati ogw’Obulamu
Ampadde Omubiri Ggwe
Nfunye omukisa.

1. Abakiriza ffenna
Ka twegatte wamu
Okusinza Yezu Kabaka
Mulokozi waffe.

2. Nneyanze okunnewa!
Onkoze bulungi
Leero nga mpeereddwa!
Ompadde ebirungi.

3. Yezu Kabaka wange
Ka nkwesigenga
Oyingidde omwange
Olw’okunjagala.

4. Kye nkusaba leero
Okukumanyanga,
N’okukwagala ennyo,
N’obutayonoona.

5. Yezu Kabaka wange
Nkusaba obuteefu
N’okukwagala ennyo
Ggwe oli mmere yange.

hymns.title: YEZU KABAKA WANGE AZZE
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Ye Yezu Kabaka azze,
Mu mwoyo gwange ,
Ensi yonna n’eggulu
Mu mubbiremu.

1. Owange kikuuno,
Emmeeme yange,
Kakaakano efuuse ,
Nyumba ya Yezu Kabaka.

2. Olulimi lyange,
Leero lumyuse
Luliko omusaayi,
Gw’omulokozi

3. Kaakano mbasinze,
Bamalayika,
Mulaba Katonda,
Nze nno mmulidde.

4. Abatuukirivu
Munsanyukire,
Omugenyi wange,
Ye Nnyiniggulu.

5. Ggwe Katonda wange,
Ng’onjagala nnyo,
Obeeranga wange,
Nange mbe wuwo.

hymns.title: YEZU KABAKA WANGE NKUSINZA
hymns.content:
1. Yezu Kabaka wange nkusinza n’omwoyo gwange,
Mu bwa Katonda bwo, mwe wekisizza:
Omutima gwange gukwewuunyiza,
Ku lw’obwetowaze mw’olabikidde.

2. Buli kye ndabako ne nkyekomako.
Empooma n’erangi binimba leero,
Ebigambo byokka bye watugamba,
Bye biibyo bye nkwata nga bya mazima.

3. Ku musaalaba gwo bwe watambirwa,
Obwa Katonda bwo tibwalabika.
Obw’omuntu bwokka bwe bwategeerwa,
Nnyongera mu mwoyo okukkiriza.

4. Ne bwe sikulaba na biwundu byo.
Omutume Toma bye yalabako,
Sso nange nkuyita Mukama wange
Ggwe Katonda wange omwagalwa wange.

hymns.title: WULIRA AKUYITA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Wulira akuyita Omukama akwagala
Genda gyali Omukama akwagala
Wulira akuyita Omukama akwagala
Okwagala okusinga awo oli kusanga wa ggwe?

1. Wulira Omukama agamba,
Nnajjirira kunoonya ababuze,
Mujje gyendi ababonaabona.
Nnaabawummuza.

2. Anti yezu Kabaka ge maanyi g’abalwana.
Bw’oba nnaffe tuba bagumu nnyo
Anti Yezu Kabaka lye ssanyu ly’abalungi
Era ge maanyi mu banafu abakoye.

3. Wulira era nno akwagala okuyinga,
Yezu Kabaka yalonda asigalenga naffe.
Era ali awo, amazima akulinze!
Kale genda, weyolekeyo ggwe!

4. Ebyasoba eby’edda amazima biwedde,
Ekisa ky’Omukama kati kikulinze!
Biri eby’edda, mazima biveeko!
Genda ew’Omukama mube ba mukwano.

hymns.title: AYI MWOYO MUTUUKIRIVU
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Ayi Mwoyo Mutuukirivu,
Omutonzi waffe jjangu,
Otuule mu myoyo gyaffe,
N’enneema zo zigijjuze.

1. Ayi ggwe Omuwolereza,
Katonda atatondebwa,
Omuliro n’okwagala,
Mbeera ggwe nsulo y’enneema.

2. Otuwe n’okutegeera,
Otuseemu n’okwagala,
Otujjuze n’amanyi go,
Mu mubiri ne mu mwoyo.

3. Otugobeko sitaani,
Otuwe emirembe ku nsi,
Otukulembere ffenna,
Otuwonye ennaku zzona.

4. Tuddukidde gyoli ffenna,
Tuyige Patri ne Mwaana,
Nawe tukukirizenga,
Leero ate n’ennaku zonna.

5. Leero tusseemu ekitibwa,
Katonda Patri ne Mwaana,
Tubatendereze wamu,
Ne Mwoyo Mutuukirivu.

hymns.title: EBITONE BYA MWOYO MUTUUKIRIVU
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Ayi Mwoyo Mutuukirivu, mukubagiza we myoyo,
Vva mu ggulu otubeeremu, otuwe ebitone byo. (x 2)

1. Tuwe ffenna okutya Katonda
Nga tumussamu ekitiibwa,
Tutyenga nnyo okumujemera,
Ye Kitaffe gwe twagala.

2. Tuwe obujjumbizi mu kukiriza Yezu Kabaka
Nga twagala Yezu Kabaka waffe,
Nga tumwewa nessanyu lingi
Mu byonna tumusanyuse.

3. Era tuwe nekyokumanya
Tulabe omutonzi waffe
Nga bwali mu bitonde byonna
Ebyava mu mikono gye.

4. Tukusaba otuwe ekyamaanyi
Tube bagumu mu Yezu Kabaka,
Tusobole ennaku zonna
Ffenna nga tuli bazira.

5. Tukusaba okubuulirirwa
Tuyambibwe okutegeera,
Ebisaana nebitasaana
Ne tubeera ba mazima.

6. Nekitone ekyobutegeezi
Ekitumanyisa Yezu Kabaka,
Ne kitangaaza emyoyo gyaffe
Ggwe Mwoyo kitugabire.

7. Namagezi ffe tugasaba
Okutamwa ebyensi byonna,
Netuwoomerwa ebya Katonda
Era nago tugasaba.

hymns.title: MWOYO OMUTONZI JANGU
hymns.content:
1. Mwoyo Omutonzi jangu,
Okyalire abakwegomba,
Jjuza beddu n’enneema yo,
Emmeeme zabatonde bo.

2. Gwe oli musaasizi,
Ggwe nsuulo yobuwanguzi,
Katonda atatondeebwa,
Ggwe muliro gwe kwagala.

3. Ggwe otwogeza ebya mazima,
Nga Patri bwe yasuubiza,
Ggwe lunwe lw’omukono gwe,
Mugabi ng’otugabidde .

4. Tumulise neggezi lyo,
Otwagaze ebiragiro,
Tugumye era na maanyi go
Endwadde ng’ozitugyako.

5. Sitaani mutugobere,
Eddembe lituweereze,
Tutwale tukulembere,
Buli kabi tukewale.

6. Tumanye Patri Ssemaka,
Ne Mwaana eyatulokola,
Tweyongere okukiriza,
Ne Mwoyo nnyini kwagala

7. Katonda Patri atakoma,
Ne Mwaana ggwe eyazuukira,
Era ggwe Mukubagiza,
Mutendebwe lubeerera.

hymns.title: WAMMA WAMMA ATENDEREZEBWE
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Wamma wamma atenderezebwe,
Wamma wamma atenderezebwenga
Omukama atuwadde Mwoyo we.

1. Katonda Kitaffe nze mwebaza
Yanfula mwaana mu nnyumba ye
Yampa anaantukuza Omusubize
Mwoyo wa Kristu Omwaana we.

2. Yalanga luli edda nti alijjula
Abantu abangi abamumanyi
Bonna ne balanga ebikusike
Ebintu ebikulu ebirijja.

3. Katonda Kitaffe yamutuwa,
Mwoyo owa Kristu n’atujjula
Mwoyo ow’amagezi atwagala,
Mwoyo ow’amaanyi yantambuza

4. Musinza Kitaffe butakoma,
Nnewuunya nnyo nze ekisa ekikye,
Ampadde ekirabo ekikusike,
Mwoyo ow’amaanyi Mutalemwa!

5. Mwoyo wa Kristu ankozesa.
Ebisinga nze mbisobola,
Afuula abanku kunsi kuno
Bigwa mw’asiiba ng’alamula

6. Mwoyo wa Kristu y’alungiya
Emyoyo egyaffe ne giddawo
Yanfula mutuufu nze mmwebaza!
Nnafuuka mwaana mu nnyumba ye!

7. Leero n’omutima omusanyufu,
Nyimba n’amaanyi ettendo lye,
Nsiiba mu kutenda nga nnebaza
Mwoyo wa Kristu antambuza.

8. Mwoyo wa Kristu ampanirira
Nsaba onyambe tube wamu
Nsabanga ommulise nneme kugwa
Manye namaanyi gwe golina.

hymns.title: AWABA OKWAGALA
hymns.content:
Chorus:
Awaba okwagalana n’okwagala
Awo Katonda abaawo.

1. Okwagala kwa Yezu Kabaka kwatugatta wamu – Awo Katonda...
Tujaguze era tukusanyukiremu ffe – Awo Katonda...
Katonda omulamu tumutye era tumwagale – Awo Katonda...
Ffe tumwagale ne mu mitima obutalekaamu. – Awo Katonda...

2. Awo nno bwe tukunganira awamu – Awo Katonda...
Twekkanye tuleme kwawukana mu birowoozo – Awo Katonda...
Ennyombo embi n’empaka zikomere ddala – Awo Katonda...

3. Era tulabire wamu n’abatukirivu – Awo Katonda...
Ayi Yezu Kabaka, amaaso go mu kitiibwa – Awo Katonda...
Essanyu eritapimika era eddungi – Awo Katonda...
Emirembe n’emirembe egitaggwaawo – Awo Katonda...

hymns.title: EKIRAGIRO EKIGGYA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Ekiragiro ekiggya kye mbalekera kye ekyo
Mwagalanenga, mwagalanenga x 2

1. Nga Kitange bwa njagala namwe bwe mutyo.
Ab’oluganda mwenna... (mwagalanenga, mwagalanenga x 2)

2. Nga kirungi aboluganda okusaba awamu
Aboluganda mwenna...

3. Wonna awaba okwagala awo Omukama abaawo.
Aboluganda mwenna...
Ekiragiro ekiggya kye mbalekera kye ekyo

4. Yezu Kabaka, Ggwe Katonda omu atudde wakati.
Aboluganda mwenna...

5. Omwagalwa Katonda waffe atukuuma
Awamu mwenna.

6. Nga abalungi besiimye abo abatya Katonda.
Ekiragiro ekiggya kye mbalakera kye ekyo

7. Lyonna ettima eritwawukanya, Lyonna likome.
Aboluganda mwenna..

8. Zonna entalo n’ebyawukanya byonna bigobe.
Aboluganda mwenna.

9. Ggwe Omukama Katonda omu atudde wakati.
Aboluganda mwenna

10. Ffenna tusaanye ab’oluganda okusagambiza
Aboluganda mwenna

hymns.title: KATONDA NGA YAYINGA OKWAGALA ENSI
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Katonda nga yayinga okwagala ensi
Okwagala kwe tukubunye nga twagalana
Katonda nga yayinga okwagala ensi
Okwagala kwe tukubunye wonna.

1. Adamu n’Eva nga basobeza
Teyabaleka ttayo yatuma omununuzi – Katonda...
Omwaana omu ati gwe yalina,
N’amuwaayo ku lwaffe atulokole – Katonda...

2. Yezu Kabaka atwagala,
Bwe tusobya atulinze atusonyiwe – Katonda...
A tutegekera bulijjo embaga ye
Tufune Omubiri n’omusaayi gwe – Katonda...

3. Okufuna obulamu obw’olubeerera,
Twagale Katonda ne banaffe – Katonda...
Ekigambo kye tukibunye n’okwagalana.
Olwo alituwa empeera mu ggulu – Katonda...

hymns.title: KATONDA WO OMWAGALANGA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Katonda wo omwagalanga n’omutima gwonna,
Muganda wo omwagalanga
N’omutima gwonna, omwagalanga

1. Oyagala otya Katonda wo n’otakuuma bulamu bwe?
Nedda nedda mwattu owubwa.
Ayagala Katonda aba mulamu mu mwoyo.

2. Oyagala otya Katonda wo n’otagenda kusinza?
Nedda nedda agamba bwatyo owubwa.
Ayagala Katonda mu kibiina kye mwabeera.

3. Oyagala otya Katonda wo nogaya bye yagamba?
Nedda, nedda agamba bwatyo owubwa.
Ayagala Katonda akkiriza, atuusa byonna.

hymns.title: KITAFFE BY’OKOLA BYONNA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Kitaffe by’okola byonna, birungi by’okoze mu ffe
Birungi by’okola byonna ku nsi, osaanira kutendwa
ffe abantu b’oganza bw’otyo, osaanira kutendwa ggwe
Nnamugereka – Ka tukwebaze ku lwaleero.

1. Mujje muwulire abayita bye mbatendera
Mujje muwulire ebinene bye njogerako:
Yafuula abakopi baana b’alabirira,
Nawa ffe okulaba bwali ow’ekisa.

2. Mujje tuyimbire Omukama nnyini bulamu,
Mujje tubalage Omukama byatukolera;
Yafuula abakopi eggwanga linamukisa,
Yassa obulamu mu ffe obujjuvu.

3. Mujje muyimbire Omukama olw’obulungi bwe,
Kubanga yatuwa ebirungi eby’okumukumu.
Afudde olunaku olwaffe lunnamukisa,
Naffe tweyagale, sso ka twejage.

4. Mujje mukakase abange by’atukolera,
Mujje ffe tuwere okukola ebimusanyusa;
Mulungi mutuufu Omukama anatuyambako,
Anti yatutuma, ffe bajulizi.

hymns.title: MUJJE ABAGALWA MUJJE BE MMANYI
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Mujje abagalwa – Mujje be mmanyi
Mujje ewa Kitange - Mu bwa Kabaka bwe
Mujje ab’omukwano – Mujje mmwe
Kubanga mwajuna nze – Ku nsi kuno
Obulamu n’ekitiibwa – Byonna ebyo
Kitange anabaweera – Mujje mmwe.

1. Nga ndi muyala mwampa eky’okulya,
mwampa eky’okunywa banange mwannyamba.
Nga ndi mugenyi mwansuza,
mwankumaakuma bannange mwannyamba.

2. Nga ndi bukunya mwandabirira,
Mwampa kemulina bannange mwannyamba.
Nga ndi musiibe mwandabirira,
mwankumaakuma bannange mwannyamba.

3. Nga ndi kundiri mwanzijanjaba,
mwambudaabuda bannange mwannyamba.
Nga ntaawa mwankumaakuma,
mwambudaabuda bannange mwannyamba.

4. Tulyewuunya ne twebuuza nti;
“Twakulaba ddi ne tukuyamba?”
Omukama aliddamu;
Buli ky’okolera omu ku baliwo
Buli ky’okolera banno bolina
Buli kyokolera abo oba okikoledde nze.
Mujje abe mikwano – Mujje mmwe
Kubanga mwajuna nze – Ku nsi kuno
Obulamu n’ekitiibwa – Byonna ebyo
Kitange anaabaweera – Mujje mmwe.

hymns.title: MWAGALANENGA NGA BWE NNABAAGALA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Mwagalanenga nga nze bwe nnabaagala
Mwagalane nga nze bwe nnabaagala.

Ekiragiro ekiggya kye mbawa nze, mwagalanenga mwenna.

Tiwali ayagala nga oyo awaayo obulamu bwe okubeera munne.

Muliba mikwano gyange, mukwata bye mbalagira byonna.

Sikyabayita baddu, mbayita mikwano gyange, munywerere mu
kwagala.

Bye nnawulira eri Kitange nnabibamanyisa byonna.

Munywerere ku mukwano gwange musigale nga mbaagala.

hymns.title: NDI SIIMISA KI NZE OMUKAMA
hymns.content:
Ekidd: 
Ndisiimisa ki nze Omukama
Olw’ebirungi by’ampadde atyo nze,
Ndi siimisa ki nze Omukama, ambedde!

1. Nnalimu okwesiga ne bwe nnagamba nti:
Nze nga ndabye nnyo!

2. Nze nnatya ne nngamba nti;
Buli muntu mulimba bulala. (Ekidd).

3. Nnaddiza ki Omukama
Olwa byonna bye yampa.

4. Nja kuddira ekikompe ky’obulokofu
Nkowoole erinnya ly’Omukama.

5. Bye nnetemye ew’Omukama nja kubituusa’
Ng’eggwanga lye lyonna liri awo.

6. Kwa muwendo mu maaso g’Omukama
Okufa kw’abatuukirivu be.

7. Ayi Mukama, nze ndi muweereza wo,
Nze ndi muweereza wo, mwaana wa muzaana wo
Ggwe wasumulula envumba zange.

hymns.title: NJA KUNYWERERA KU YEZU KABAKA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Nja kunywerera ku Yezu Kabaka nze gwe nnalondawo
Luliba lumu ne nngenda n’ampeera.

1. Kansimbe mu luwenda olw’abatukirivu,
Nange ngobe ku mwalo oguli eri ogw’emirembe.

2. Abatuukirivu mu nsi yabanneegombya,
Mpulira eddoboozi nange nga limpita okugenda

3. Baagenda bakaaba nga bagenda okusiga.
Kyokka mu makungula baakomawo bayimba.

4. Abaamujulira abo yabawunda,
N’abasembeza oyo Yezu Kabaka eri Kitaawe.

hymns.title: OKWAGALA KUKIRA BYONNA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Okwagala kukira byonna,
Yezu Kabaka yanjagala,
Kyamazima ayagala ffenna,
Tumwagale yee yatwagala.

1. Nazalibwa okubeera nze,
Nabonaabona okubeera nze,
Nakubibwa okubeera nze,
Neyeraga ng’era anjagala.

2. Navumibwa okubeera nze,
Nayigiriza okubeera nze,
Nakomererwa okubeera nze,
Neyeeraga nti era anjagala.

3. Nakomererwa okubeera nze.
Nafumitibwa okubeera nze,
Era nattibwa okubeera nze,
Neyeeraga ng’era anjagala.

4. Navumibwa okubeera nze,
Nakubibwa okubeera nze,
Nawalanibwa okubeera nze,
Neyeeraga ng’era anjagala.

5. Yatwagala ffe natubiita,
Natubiita ffe natuganza,
Natufuula ffe abakristu,
Neyeeraga ng’era anjagala.

hymns.title: SINGA OMUKAMA TEYALI NAFFE
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Singa Omukama teyali naffe twandibuze
Twandibuze, twandibuze ffenna netuggwaawo
Singa Omukama teyali naffe banditumize
Banditumize ffenna netuggwaawo.

1. Yatuwonya enzikiza ekutte, yonna eyo netugivaamu
Yatuwonya ebingi ebizibu, byonna ebyo netubivaamu.
Yatuwonya ebingi ebigezo, byonna ebyo netubivaamu.
Lwe baali baswakidde, bonna abo Omukama nawugula.
Singa Omukama teyali naffe .......

2. Nzijukira emyaka emizibu, nzijukira ebiseera ebizibu
Nzijukira amaanyi amatono, nzijukira obulamu obuzito.
Nzijukira ebingi ebirema, nzijukira olutalo oluzibu (x2)
Singa Omukama teyali naffe .......

3. Teyampaayo........................Lwebaali bannoonya
Teyanvaamu........................Lwegwaali gunsinze
Teyansuula.......................... Lwebaali bandeese
Teyegaana........................... Ffe abamukowoola. (x 2)

4. Ndimuwa ki nze eyanjagala era nambita,
Ndimuwa ki okumwebaza oli?
Ndimuwa ki nze eyanzibira era nankuuma,
Ndimuwa ki okumwebaza oli?
Ndimuwa ki nze eyannwanirira...... Ddunda
Ndimuwa ki okumwebaza oli?

5. Kyenva ntenda Katonda oli eyanganza
Asaana kutendwa Katonda oli nantalemwa x 2.
Amaanyi ampadde nnywanye nnyo nze mwebaza....Assaana.. ....
Eyansenza oyo nandeeta nze mwebaza............Asaana......
Eyanonda oyo ne mba wuwe nze mwebaza........Asaana.....
Ankumye bwati ndi mwebaza ntya, Katonda wange?!
Kyenva ntenda Katonda oli eyanganza
Asaana kutendwa Katonda oli nantalemwa x 2.

6. Obweyamo bwange kwe kulonda oyo nno oyo annonze.
Obweyamo bwange kwe kubeera n’oyo oyo annewadde.
Obweyamo bwange kwe kunywerera ku oyo oyo annywezezza.
Kyenva ntenda Katonda oli eyanganza
Asaana kutendwa Katonda oli nantalemwa x 2.

7. Kiriba kiki leero nno ekirinzigya ku Ggwe Ddunda- Njagala
nnyamba?
Nebwaliba walumbe ndyewaayo nenkufirira.
Nebwebuliba bugagga ndibuwayo mbeere wuwo.
Nebwegiriba mikwano ndyevaamu mbeere wuwo.
Mmalilira Mukama ndi wuwo emirembe, emirembe,
Nze ndi wuwo.

hymns.title: TWANDIBADDE TUTYA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Twandibadde tutya singa Yezu Kabaka teyajja
Twandibadde wa ffe Ha Yezu Kabaka yebazibwe

1. Twandifudde bubi, twandibuze ffenna,
Yezu Kabaka yatulonda.

2. Twandifudde bubi ffeno abonoonyi,
Yezu Kabaka yatulokola.

3. Twandifudde bubi mu kizikiza eky’ekibi
Yatuwa ekitangaala

4. Gwanditusinze nnyo, netuvumirirwa ffenna,
Yezu Kabaka yeebazibwe.

5. Twandibadde bani, yanditwefuze ffenna,
Sitaani twamuwoona.

hymns.title: WANJAGALA NNYO MUKAMA WANGE
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Wanjagala nnyo Mukama wange,
Wambiita Lugaba,
Nze atalina bwendi mu maaso go,
Nokiriza mbe omwaana.

1. Nze ani gwe walonda, nze ani gwe waganza?!
Nze ani gwe wabiita, nze omwonoonyi bwenti, Lugaba!

2. Ddunda ekisa kyo, kingi nze nkitenda,
Anti gwe wasiima, onkunfuula omwaana, Lugaba!

3. Byenkola nze Taata, bingi byebikyaamu,
Mumaaso go nze nenswala, ate gwe nonganza, Lugaba!

4. Nze nno nga nkunyoomye, bwentyo nga nkugaanyi,
Tewandeka kuwaba kubula, wajja era onoonye, Lugaba!

5. Okwagala kwo Yezu Kabaka, gyendi nze kusuffu,
Wasaasira nze nombiita, wantumira Omwaana, Lugaba!

6. Zakuyinga Yezu Kabaka, zaakukaabya Taata,
Nokomererwa ku musaalaba, naafa okubeera nze, Lugaba!

hymns.title: WANNONDA DDUNDA
hymns.content:
Ekidd: 
Wannonda Ddunda
Wannonda Ddunda
N’osiima mbeere wuwo
Wanfuula Mwaana nga mbatizibwa
Wansiiga omuzigo
N’onkakasa mu butume bwo
N’afuuka kigwa mw’osiiba
Mw’otuula Ggwe Katonda
Ha! Nnesiimye,
Ha! Ng’onjagala. x 2

1. Mujje mulabe Omukama by’akola, bya magero
Bisamaaliriza by’akolera abantu.
Tukwekola Ggw’atubumba
Tukwekola, Ggw’atutaasa
Tukwekola ggwe Ddunda Lugaba.

2. Mujje mulabe Omukama by’akola, bya magero
Bisamaaliriza waddiramu abantu.
Tukwebaza Ggw’atulokola,
Tukwebaza Ggw’omusaasizi
Tukwebaza Ggw’alunda ffenna.

3. Mujje mulabe Omukama by’akola, bya magero
Bisamaaliriza w’angobako obutamanya.
Ssirimbibwa buli kijja,
Ssirimbibwa mangu nnyo,
Ssirimbibwa nze Kristu gwe mmanyi.

4. Mujje mulabe Omukama by’akola, bya magero
Kristu Katonda, Ggwe mmere y’abantu.
Tukwebaza Ggw’atuliisa,
Tukwebaza Ggw’entanda,
Tukwebaza Ggw’atwewa wenna.

5. Mujje mulabe Omukama by’akola, bya magero
Bisamaaliriza by’akolera abantu.
Tuba naye buli wantu,
Tuba naye mu nngendo,
Tuba naye ewaffe mu maka.

hymns.title: YANI YANI OYO
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Yani, Yani Oyo!
Ali nzijja ku Yezu Kabaka, yani?
Yani, Yani Oyo!
Ali nzijja ku Yezu Kabaka, yani oyo?

1. Ssente,                      Ekidd: Nedda
Baana,
Basajja,
Bakazi,
Abalanzi ab’obulimba.
2. Maria,                         Ekidd: Nedda
Paapa,
Amadiini ag’obulimba,
Busungu,
Amasanyu g’ensi,
3. Buseegu,                     Ekidd: Nedda
Bukaba
Bubbi
Bulimba,
Mululu

3. Nkakasiza ddala mazima nti; newandibadde ebiriwo,
Newandibadde ebirijja, tewali kirinzijja ku Yezu Kabaka.

hymns.title: YEZU KABAKA GE MAGOBA GE NOONYA
hymns.content:
1. Nzijukira ebingi ebyedda ebyo byannema,
Nakwatanga makyamu amakubo nawaba nnyo.
Nnakolanga n’amanyi okulaba nga nnyikira,
Nakwatanga makyamu amakubo nawaba nnyo.
Nnagobereranga ebyo bye nnayita ebingaasa
Nakwatanga makyamu amakubo nawaba nnyo.
Nnagobereranga ebyo bye nnayita ebisanyusa.
Nakwatanga makyamu amakubo nawaba nnyo.

2. Naye kati olw’okubeera Yezu Kabaka,
Ebyo byennayita amagoba, ebinyuma ebigasa:
Nkizudde kwaali kufiirwa – Nkizudde yali nsobi nnyo.
Nkizudde nnamala biseera – Byonna ebyo kwali kufiirwa.
Olw’ekyo byonna bwembigeranya n’okumanya
Yezu Kabaka Omukama ekitenkanika;
Ndaba nga kwali kufiirwa – Nkizudde yali nsobi nnyo.
Ndaba nga nnamala biseera – Byonna ebyo kwali kufiirwa
Naye olw’okubeera Yezu Kabaka;
Nnabimala nze mbiyita bisasiro nnabimala
Byonna olw’okubeera Yezu Kabaka;
Nnabivaako nze mbiyita bisasiro nnabivaako.

Tutti: 
Yezu Kabaka ge magoba ge nnoonya
Omukama ge magoba gentereka (x 2)

. Njagala ndabike nga sirina ku lwange kintukuza,
Nga sirina ku lwange kindokola wadde etteeka;
Wabula okumanya nti ;
Okukiriza okwo kwekundokola
Okwagala okwo kwe ku nnyamba (x 2)

Tutti: 
Yezu Kabaka ge magoba ge nnoonya
Omukama ge magoba gentereka (x 2)

3. Njagala muyige, njagala mmumanye,
Njagala muyige, njagala mmumanye,
Njagala muyige, njagala mmumanye,
Yezu Kabaka omulungi mmumanye eyandokola.

Bass: 
Nze njagala muyige njagala,
Nze njagala muyige njagala,
Nze njagala muyige njagala,
Nze njagala muyige njagala,

Mmanye namaanyi agasibuka mukuzuukira kwe,
Ntegeere n’amakulu ag’okugabana ku musalaba,
N’ofa n’omufaanana nga ye.

Suprano: 
Nange nsubira bwentyo
Nga ndizukira amazima
Nange nsubira bwentyo
Nga ndizukira mubafu

Tutti:
Sigamba nti ndi mutuufu,
Sigamba nti ntukiridde,
Sigamba nti ndi mulungi,
Sigamba nti empeera ngifunye.

Naye nno nsooka busoosi, muli nze ndi mu kunoonya,
Muli nze nsaba namaanyi, Omukama njagala mutuuke.
Suprano: Wabula ndayira era malirira

Bass: Wabula ndayira era malirira nengamba:
Nti ebyedda ebyo – nabivaako nti ebyedda ebyo tebinuma.
Ebyo ebyayita – Nnabimala nti ebyo ebyayita nabibuuka,
Kristu omununuzi – yabimalawo oyo eyanganza era atalinjuza.
Nze ndubirira bino – ebirijja embiro njagala nzituuse nga bwagamba.
Ye alyoke ampere – oyo Omutonzi, empeera eyo ye gye yanngamba;
Ngifune mu Yezu Kabaka – oyo Omununuzi, oyo eyannganza era
atalinjuza.

Tutti: 
Yezu Kabaka ge magoba ge nnoonya
Omukama ge magoba gentereka (x 2)

hymns.title: YEZU KABAKA NNAKWAGALA DDA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Yezu Kabaka nnakwagala dda ne nkumanya
Ggwe Katonda wange ggwe njagala.

1. Wava mu ggulu eyo nojja omponya,
N’onfuula omwaana ow’essanyu.

2. Patri Kitange yakundaga dda.
Nti ono ye Mwaana, mumuwulirenga!

3. Yoana Batista n’akwanjula,
Nti Akaliga kaako akaggyawo ebibi! O...!

4. Ku mbaga y’e Kana weeraga ggwe
N’oyoleka ekitiibwa n’ekisa kyo!

5. Ku lwokuna olutukuvu, Mukama wange,
Weewaayo Ggwe Yezu Kabaka ofuuke mmere! O...!

6. Baakubonyabonya Ggwe, wanjagala,
N’onfirira Ggwe Yezu Kabaka, ku musaalaba.

7. Ate wazuukira Yezu Kabaka, n’omponya.
N’onzigulira nze eggulu eryo.

8. Buli lunaku Yezu Kabaka obeera nange
N’ongabira ebirungi nesiimye.

9. Bwe nkufuna Yezu Kabaka, liba ssanyu.
Ate bwe nkufiirwa, ziba nnaku nsa.

10. Ka nfiirwe emikwano n’amasanyu,
Nneesibe ku Yezu Kabaka eyanjagala!

11. Eby’ensi eno Yezu Kabaka, tibimatiza.
Eyemalira ku ggwe y’amatira! O...!

12. Omwoyo gwange, Kristu teguweera,
Okugyako, Ggwe Yezu Kabaka, nga gukuzudde. O...!

13. Nnyamba nkuweereze Mukama wange,
Lulikya, Kitange, ne nkulaba. O...!

hymns.title: YEZU KABAKA OKUKUWULIRA
hymns.content:
1. Yezu Kabaka okukuwulira,
Lye ssanyu lye myoyo gyaffe,
Naye ekisinga byonna,
Kwekubeera kumpi nawe.

2. Teri kigambo kya ssanyu,
Na kitabo kitereevu,
Teri nyimba mpoomerevu,
Awatatendebwa Yezu Kabaka.

3. Tiwali gwe nnyimbirira,
Tiwali gwe mpuliriza,
Tewali gwe nzijukira,
Asinga Yezu Kabaka ekisa.

4. Osaasira ayonnona,
Owulira akusaba,
Akunoonya tomubula,
Akusanga wa mukisa.

5. Nnandibadde nga njogera,
Nnandibadde nga mpandiika,
Sisobola kunyonnyola,
Yezu Kabaka bwali omwagalwa.

6. Nolulimi tirunyumya,
Nenukuta tetegeeza,
Ageza yekka yamanya,
Yezu Kabaka bwali omwagalwa.

7. Yezu Kabaka beera ssanyu lyaffe,
Nga bwoliba empeera yaffe,
Muggwe wekka tujjaguze,
Emirembe ne mirembe.

hymns.title: YEZU KABAKA WAFFE NG’OTWAGALA
hymns.content:
1. Yezu Kabaka waffe ng’otwagala.
Ffe ffena watulokola,
Watuzaalirwa mu bwavu
Ffenna tugende mu ggulu.

2. Yezu Kabaka waffe ng’otwagala.
Ffe ffenna watufiirira
N’otuggulira omutima
Gubeere ensulo y’enneema.

3. Yezu Kabaka waffe ng’otwagala.
Yisaaya yatubuulira,
Nti munaasenaanga amazzi
Mu nzizzi z’omulokozi.

4. Yezu Kabaka tuwe tukwagale
Fuulanga emitima gyaffe
Mikkakkamu, miwombeefu.
Gikuweereze n’essanyu.

hymns.title: KATONDA YEEBALE
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Katonda yeebale, yeebale nnyo,
Katonda yeebala, yeebale,
Nja kumwebazanga emirembe gyonna,
Nja kumwebazanga obutediza.

1. Obulamu bwe nnina ku nsi kuno buli ku bwani?
Ayi Mukama ggwe abumpa ndi kwebaza ntya!
Essanyu lye nnina ku nsi kuno liri ku bwani?
Ayi Mukama ggwe alimpa ndi kwebaza ntya!

2. Emyaaka gyemaze ku nsi kuno giri ku bwani?
Ayi Mukama ggwe ankumye ndi kwebaza nyta!
Obuggaga bwe nnina ku nsi kuno buli ku bwaani?
Ayi Mukama ggwe abumpa ndi kwebaza ntya!

3. Amaka ago gendimu ku nsi kuno gali ku bwani?
Ayi Mukama ggwe agampa ndi kwebaza ntya!
Abaana be nnina ku nsi kuno bali ku bwani?
Ayi Mukama ggwe abampa ndi kwebaza ntya!

4. Abazadde be nnina ku nsi kuno bali ku bwani?
Ayi Mukama nze omwaana ndi kwebaza ntya!
Emikwano gye nnina ku nsi kuno giri ku bwani?
Ayi Mukama ggwe agimpa ndi kwebaza ntya!

5. Ebyo bye nkoze ku nsi kuno biri ku bwani?
Ayi Mukama ggwe ankumye ndi kwebaza ntya!
Entalo ze ngobye ku nsi kuno ziri ku bwani?
Ayi Mukama ggwe annyambye ndi kwebaza ntya!

6. Ebigambo byo ku nsi kuno biri ku bwani?
Ayi Mukama ggwe Ddunda ndi kwebaza ntya!
E Ggulu gye ndaga gy’obeera liri ku bwani?
Ayi Mukama, ggwe Ddunda ndi kwebaza ntya!

hymns.title: MUJJE TWEBAZE OMUKAMA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Mujje ctwebaze Omukama,
Kubanga mulungi, muzirakisa,
N’okusaasira okukwe kwa mirembe gyonna.

1. Sirina bigambo nze bya kukwebaza, Mukama wange.
Olw’ebirungi by’onkolera ng’ondabirira.

2. Okwegayirira okwange wakuwulira mu ssaala zange.
Okutu watega n’owulira nze bye nkugamba.

3. Amakubo n’emitego ebya Sitaani nze nabiwona.
Kubanga nnakusaba okulokola obulamu bwange.

4. Oli mutuufu era wa kisa, Mukama wange.
Abatene n’abanaku era ggwe tobasuula muguluka.

5. Mwoyo wange wesirikire, jaguliza mu Katonda.
Wedire mu nteeko, n’Omukama omuyimbire.

6. Mwoyo gwange ye yaguwonya olumbe, gwali gwa kufa.
Omukama, amaziga gange nago yagasangula.

hymns.title: NNAKWEBAZA NTYA MUKAMA WANGE
hymns.content:

Abakuweereza...............Obakuuma

Naabula ki nze...............Ng’ompanirira.

1. Nga Kitaawe w’abaana bw’abaagala,
N’Omukama bwatyo bwatwaagala abamutya.
Atumanyi nga bwe twakolebwa,
Ajjukira nga tuli nfuufu.

2. Nga Kitaawe w’abaana bw’abaagala,
N’Omukama bwatyo bwatwaagala abamutya.
Atumanyi nga bwe twakolebwa,
Ajjukira ffenna kinnoomu.

3. Ng’oli wa kisa nnyo ggwe Katonda wange
Naajaguza Ddunda nga nkwebaza by’ompa
Bye wakola nga bisukirivu,
Nze ssibala byonna Ggwe byompa.

4. Wankulembera Ddunda n’onnambika
Wangabira amaanyi nnawangula ebizibu
Bwe nayiita DDunda wampulira,
Ng’ojjukira nti tuli nfuufu.

5. Nzuuno kye nsaba Ddunda okuva kati,
Nnakwesiga nkwewa onnambike mbe wuwo
Ggwe otumanyi nga bwe twakolebwa
Ggwe w’otali tewaba ddembe.

hymns.title: TUKWEBAZA PATRI KATONDA
hymns.content:
