Tukwebaza Patri Katonda,
Byewakola bya kitiibwa nnyo, weebale.
Tukwebaza Mwaana Katonda,
Byewakola bya kitiibwa nnyo, weebale.
Tukwebaza Mwoyo Mutukirivu Katonda,
Byewakola bya kitiibwa nnyo, weebale.

1. Mwebaze Omukama kubanga mulungi,
Ekisa kye kya mirembe gyonna.

2. Ka abatya Omukama bonna bagambe nti,
Ekisa kye kya mirembe gyonna.

3. Mu nnaku nnakowoola Omukama,
Omukama yampulira n’amponya -
Ekisa kye.....

4. Omukama ali nange, ye muyambi wange.
Nnange nnalaba abalabe bange bwe baswala.
Ekisa kye.....

5. Okweyuna Omukama kirungi ,
Okusinga okwesiga omuntu ono.
Ekisa kye.....

6. Omukama ge maanyi gange, bwe buzira bwange.
Yanfuukidde Omulokozi.
Ekisa kye.....

7. Ddyo w’Omukama akoze eby’amaanyi,
Ddyo w’Omukama ansitudde
Ddyo w’Omukama akozezza maanyi.
Ekisa kye.....

8. Sijja kufa nja kulama,
Ndirojja ebikolwa by’Omukama.
Ekisa kye.....

9. Guno gwe mulyango gw’Omukama,
Abatuufu be baliguyitamu okuyingira.
Ekisa kye.....

10. Luno lwe lunaku Omukama lwakoze,
Tulujagulizeemu, tulusanyukiremu ffe.
Ekisa kye.....

11. Ayi Mukama, ndokola.
Ayi Mukama leeta emirembe gyo.
Ekisa kye.....

hymns.title: ABASUMBA
hymns.content:

Oyo azaliddwa ye Mwaana wa Katonda

Mwaana wa Katonda

1. Obwekiro
Ekitangaala ekyo,
Ekyakira wano
Kivudde wa leero?

2. Eddoboozi
Lyabamalayika,
N’enyimba ezivuga,

3. Oyo Mwaana
Azazikiddwa awo,
Wansi mu kisibo,
Anti ye Katonda.

4. Mutegeere
Buli muntu kunsi,
Owo mwoyo omulungi,
Atuule mirembe.

hymns.title: AZZE OMUSUUBIZE
hymns.content:
Soprano/Alto: Azze, Azze, Azze omusuubize
Bass/Tenor - Azze, Azze, atuuse omusuubize, omusuubize
Soprano/Alto - Ye – oyo Bajjajja ffe bali ab’edda gwe baalanga
Bass/Tenor - Bajjajja ffe bali abedda gwe baalanga.

1. Suprano: Atuuse wamma bali abedda gwe balanga.
B/T/A: Alleluiah. Alleluiah. Alleluiah. Alleluia.
Atuuse amazima ye mulokozi atuzalidwa.
B/T/A: Alleluiah. Alleluiah. Alleluiah. Alleluia.

2. Azze eno Katonda wuuno Yezu Kabaka azze ku nsi
Ye wuuyo atuuse ye musuubize atwewadde

3. Obwavu obuzibu obwo nno Mukama bwe yeeroboza
Mu ky’ente ekisibo, mu Mmanvu mw’azazikiddwa.

4. Abasajja abasumba azze Malayika ababuulidde,
Nti temutya mbagumya Omulokozi abazaalidwa.

5. Omukama Katonda wuuno naffe ye Emanuel.
Ye Kabaka alamula, ye Messiya ate ke Kaliga.

6. Ffena kati abantu Kristu Mukama atwagadde
Mu nnyimba ezinyuma tumuyimbire anti tununuddwa.

hymns.title: WUUNO LABA ATUUSE
hymns.content:
Ekidd: 
Wuuno laba atuuse, Yezu Kabaka azaliddwa
Wuuno laba atuuse, leero atuzaliddwa!
Noel! Noel! Noel! Yezu Kabaka azaliddwa (x2).

1. Ensi yalindanga Omulokozi okujja
Twali tuwabye ffenna Omulokozi okujja
Ye wuuyo Omwaana wa Katonda omu gw’azaala
Yefuula omuntu atulokole.
Mujje tumusinze! Mujje tumusinze!

2. Ensi yali eri etya Omulokozi okujja
Yali mu kusinza nte Omulokozi okujja
Ye wuuyo Omwaana wa Katonda omu gw’azaala
Yefuula omuntu atulokole.
Mujje tumusinze! Mujje tumusinze!

3. Ensi yayuuguuma Omulokozi lw’ajja
Emmunyeenye y’oli azze, Bamalayika abazibu
Be baabo Omwaana wa Katonda omu b’aleese
Beesiimye abantu abalunngamu!
Mujje tumusinze! Mujje tumusinze!

4. Mu ssanyu ery’ensusso katumwebaze okujja
Tulina kimu ky’okka okumwagala Omuzira

Mujje tumusinze! Mujje tumusinze!

hymns.title: KU LWAFFE
hymns.content:
1. Ku lwaffe Katonda waffe
Yayiwa omusaayi gwe.
Okusaanya ebibi byaffe,
Byonna bitusonyiyibwe.
Ffe abakristu tulire nnyo,
Nga twekanya Omukama,
Nga tulowooza mu mwoyo,
Ennaku zeyalaba.

2. Ng’atuuse e Getesimani,
Nagamba ng’azirika,
Kitange mpeddemu amaanyi,
Omponye omusalaba.
Naye olw’okutwagala ennyo,
Namugamba nti Ssebo,
Kola gwe kyonjagaliza,
Tokola kyenjagala.

3. Omutume omulyakuzi,
Natuuka ku Mukama,
Nalamusa Omulokozi
Namugwa mu kifuba
Awo Yezu Kabaka namubuuza,
“Ekikuleese wano?”
Ggwenayita ow’omukwano,
Ompaayo ng’onyegera.

4. Baamukwata bamutuusa,
Mu nyumba eya Kayafa.
Bonna wamu ne bagamba,
Nti asaanidde okufa!
Nebakeesa obudde bwonna,
Nga badulira Yezu Kabaka.
Bamufujjira amalusu,
Nga bamusekerera

5. Petero naakwatibwa ensonyi
Nga abuuziddwa omuzaana
Nalayira simumanyi!
Bwatyo nno namwegaana!
So yasasirwa Omukama,
Nga amusimbyeeko eriiso,
Petero nno nabonerera,
Navaayo nalira nnyo.

6. Yezu Kabaka baamuwayiriza,
Affe ku musalaba.
Pilato naasaliriza,
Naabatera Balaba!
Mukama ffe twandisaanye,
Okuliwa omusango;
Ate ggwe otufiriridde
N’otuwa ekisonyiwo.

7. Nebamuzingira amaggwa,
Ye ngule ya Kabaka!
Bagimusimba mu kyenyi,
Natirika omusaayi!
Ffe ababi nga tetufaayo,
Kulowooza mu mwoyo,
Omukama bweyalumwa,
Ngatwagalira ddala.

8. Omulokozi wa bonna,
Yetikka omusalaba,
Natuuka ku Kalivario,
Nagugalamirako.
Bamukomerera enninga,
Mu bigere n’engalo,
Bamufumita omutiima,
Mwemutuviira enema.

9. Omutonzi nalabiika,
Mukaseera akokufa.
Ensi yonna nekankana,
Enjazi nezatika.
Omulokozi bwe yafa,
Byonna byonna byakaaba,
Nafe nno tubonerere,
Olwa leero twenenye.

Ntwala eyo gy’olaga.................................Mbonabona

Mbonabona x 3

hymns.title: TUDDABIRIZE YEZU KABAKA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Tuddabirize Yezu Kabaka,
Eyatwagalira ddala,
Kulwaffe yasogwa ne ffumu,
Nawayo omusaayi gwonna

1. Ennaku zamubonyaabonya
Nga yewadde ng’omutango,
Bwe zayinga nezimukaabya
Yamala gaguma omwoyo.

2. Abalabe bwebaamukwata,
Baamutwala nga musibe
Yezu Kabaka yamala gakiriza
Asasule ebibi byaffe.,

3. Nebamutuusa ewa Pilato,
Baamuvuma bamukiina
Ye nga tabaddamu kigambo,
Natabanakuwalira

4. Ku mutwe baamusaako omuge,
Ogw’amaggwa amawanvu
Baamukuba baakeesa obudde,
Amaanyi negamugwaamu.

5. Nebaamutikka omusalaba
Ogw’omuti omuzito,
Gwamumenyamenya amabega,
Nga bwegumukuba ebigwo.

6. Mu bibatu ne mu bigere,
Baakomereramu enninga,
Omusaayi negutiriika,
Nebaasimba omusalaba.

7. Bwe yali ng’anaatera okufa
Yaddira Omyoyo ggwe
Naguwa eri Kitaawe
Ffenna ne tununulwa.

8. Yezu Kabaka Mulokozi waffe
Tukusaba otusonyiwe
Ebibi byaffe tubikyaaye,
Leero nno tuboneredde.

hymns.title: ABA KRISTU MUWULIDDE
hymns.content:
Chorus: Allellua, Allellua x 2

1. Abakristu, muwulidde
Yezu Kabaka nga bwasinze olumbe,
Mujje mumusanyukire.

2. Ne Maria Magdalena
Nabakazi abalala
Bonna bakeera kuntaana.

3. Tibaludde batuuse yo,
Banoonyeza omulambo,
Ssone batagusangayo.

4. Magdalena nabuulira,
Abatume b’omukama,
Bajja babiri kuntaana.

5. Yoana yasinga embiro
Nadduka nayisa Petro,
Namusooka ku malaalo.

6. Malayika atukula
Nabuulira abakyala,
Yezu Kabaka yazuukidde.

7. Abatume nabo bazze,
Ne bayingira muntaana
Nebasanga nga njereere.

8. Obudde nga buwungedde
Yezu Kabaka najja mu batume
Yabasanga bakungaanye.

9. Didimo baamubuulira,
Nga bwe baalabye omukama,
Nagaana okubakiriza.

10. Toma laba ebiwundu,
Mu bigere mu bibatu
Tobanga mukakanyavu.

11. Munnaku zonna enkulu,
Luno lwelusinga essanyu,
Katonda tumubbiremu.

12. Obanga twegendereza,
Naffe alituzuukiza,
Olwo fenna nga twebaza.

hymns.title: ALLELUIA ALLELUIA ALLELUIA
hymns.content:
1. Yezu Kabaka Katonda ddala
Alleluia.
Era muntu ddala.
Alleluia.

2. Yezu Kabaka awangudde olumbe.
Alleluia.
Nnaffe alituzuukiza
Alleluia.

3. Yezu Kabaka eyaliwo kati
Alleluia.
Era alibeerawo emirembe gyonna
Alleluia.

4. Yezu Kabaka awangudde amagombe
Alleluia
Ensi ne Ggulu byonna bijjaguze
Alleluia.

5. Yezu Kabaka awangulidde bonna abaana be
Alleluia
Era naffe tuli bakuwangula.
Alleluia.

hymns.title: ASULA WA YEZU KABAKA?
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Asulawa Yezu Kabaka, bweyazukira kati asulawa
ewabwe?
Gaasamye amalalo, abakumi badduse wuliriza Malayika
kuntaana abulira.
Eri gyeyagamba,
E Ggalilaya wuli gyabalinze basseruganda.
x 2
Azuukidde anti................ Leero alleluia x 4

1. Abikirwa nti yafa ; Kati ani?
Baawa abo abakabira Yezu Kabaka?
Timumanyi nti yazuukira jjo?
Muzze mmwe okuziraga ani nno?

2. Abalabye kw’eyazuukira oli,
Baasonze olunwe nebakkanya
Nga talina kukanubule ye:
Boogedde, banyumiriza ffe.

3. Amazima ayi baganda bange:
Yeggye nno emagombe nentiisa,
Alabibwa ye gwebabetenta,
Nasogwa okunnunula ensi eno!

4. Atamanyi ekyo, akibuusabuusa:
Lwaki ggwe olwa notomwanguyira,
E Ggalilaya akulindiridde,
Lwaki nno olema okugenda eyo?

5. Essanyu lye litubukale ffe,
Bagenda okuzuukiza naffe,
Omugobi oyo Kabaka waffe,
Taafenga, alisigala muffe.

hymns.title: AZUUKIDDE
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Azuukidde alleluia omuyinza wa byonna
Wuuno Yezu Kabaka
(Azuukidde) leero asinze Sitaani
N’olumbe essanyu lingi.
(Azuukidde) mu kitiibwa,
Nagenda mu kitiibwa.
(Alleluia) Alleluia, Alleluia.
(Alleluia) Alleluia, Alle – lu - ia.

1. Ne Maria Magdalena nabakazi abalala,
Bonna baakeera ku ntaana,
Nga banoonya Yezu Kabaka,
Gwe baaziika luli.
Taliwo azuukidde,
Taliiwo azuukidde.

2. Ne Maria Magdalena, nabuliira abatume,
Abo ne bajja bombi ku ntaana,
Nga banoonya Yezu Kabaka ,
Gwe baaziika luli.
Taliwo azuukidde,
Taliiwo azuukidde.

3. Yoana n’asinga Petero, namusooka gye baziika,
Bombi baanonya mu ntaana,
Nga bagala Yezu Kabaka,
Gwe baaziika luli.
Taliwo azuukidde,
Taliiwo azuukidde.

4. Malayika yabuuza bali:
Munoonya ani nga munyolwa x 2
Nga abanoonya bagamba nti;
Ffe tunoonya Yezu Kabaka,
Gwe baaziika luli.
Taliwo azuukidde,
Taliiwo azuukidde.

5. Olwaleero lukulu nnyo.
Lwelusinga ennaku zonna.
Tumwebaze Yezu Kabaka asana,
Leero agobye olumbe.
Ffenna atununudde.
Taliwo azuukidde,
Taliiwo azuukidde.

hymns.title: E GALILAYA GYE MULIMUSANGA
EWA PATRI KATONDA
hymns.content:
Ekidd: 
Ewa Patri Katonda
Yezu Kabaka addayo
//Naffe emirembe gyonna
Gy’oli tubeereyo.//

1. Olwaleero olukedde
Kigambo kya ssanyu
Yezu Kabaka atukulembedde
Ffe ffenna mu ggulu.

2. Yava e Yeruzalemu
Wamu n’Abatume
N’alinnya ku lusozi
Bonna abasiibule.

3. Yesitula n’agenda
N’amaanyi g’alina
Natumbiira mu bbanga
Nga takyalabika.

4. Eggulu lyeggulewo!
Ono ye Kabaka;
Mwenna Bamalayika
Mumwanirize nnyo.

5. Leero Mukama waffe
Atudde mu ggulu
Ku gwa ddyo gwa Kitaawe!
Abugaanye essanyu!

hymns.title: FFE ABANGI
hymns.content:
1. Ffe abangi abakunganye, Allelluia!
Essanyu litubuganye,
Kwekuyimba!
Tutendereze Yezu Kabaka, Allelluia!
Azzukidde lye suubi lyaffe,
Titwerimba, Allelluia, Allelluia, Allelluia!

2. Olumbe yaluwangudde, Allelluia!
Era ne ggulu aligudde,
Nga twesiimye!
Aswaziza omulabe waffe, Allelluia!
Natujuna mu nnaku zaffe,
Tumusinze, Allelluia, Allelluia, Allelluia!

3. Leero Sitaani akankane, Allelluia!
Ka Yezu Kabaka awangame!
Ye Kabaka!
Oyo yekka ffe gwe tusinza, Allelluia!
Kuba ye Mukama Omuyinza,
Ye Kabaka, Allelluia, Allelluia, Allelluia!

4. Yezu Kabaka tukweyunye, Allelluia!
Ensi ffenna tugidduse,
Tukulonze!
Byonna byonotulagiranga, Allelluia!
Ffenna tujja kubitusanga,
Katugonde! Allelluia, Allelluia, Allelluia!

5. Ekkubo olitusambidde, Allelluia!
Tusimbe nga gwe mwoyise,
Ng’otulinda!
Tubeere bwetulikusanga, Allelluia!
Mu ttendo lyo, ayi Omutanda,
Nga tuyimba, Allelluia, Allelluia, Allelluia!

hymns.title: GO TELL IT ON THE MOUNTAIN
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Go tell it on the mountain,
Over the hills and everywhere,
Go tell it on the mountain,
That Jesus the King, he rose.

1. Jesus the King He rose,
Because he has life,
He also offers life,
To whosoever believes.
Yeah....

2. Everybody is happy,
That Jesus the King , he rose
Even Heaven is rejoicing
Because the king did rise.
Yeah.....

3. Jesus the King, he rose,
So that we all believe,
In order to be happy,
For ever and ever more.
Yeah.....

4. We his children are grateful
For victory was at hand.
And Satan was trembling,
For he was defeated..
Yeah..........

5. Man, woman and children,
Should be filled with joy,.
Because he rose,,
And went back to the Father.
Yeah..........

6. Jesus the King is alive,
And he is our strength,
And as we all rejoice,
We should be filled with his love.
Yeah.......

7. As we all honour the Son,
Like we honour the Father,
We should also love him
Because Jesus the King did rise.
Yeah......

8. Jesus the King rose,
All nations come to him
To adore and praise him.
Jesus the King has redeemed us.
Yeah..........

9. Jesus the King our God,
Brought happiness in the world,
And also in heaven,
That is why we adore him.
Yeah.......

hymns.title: LEERO YEZU KABAKA ASINZE
hymns.content:
1. Yezu Kabaka leero asinze,
Ffena tusanyuke ne mmeme ekube ejjebe
Yezu Kabaka leero asinze,
Asinze Sitaani n’olumbe.
Mu nsi ne Ggulu, mu nnaku enkulu,
Lwazukidde mu lwelusingamu essanyu.
Tumubbiremu, tuyimbe wamu,
Alleluia mu nsi ne ggulu.

2. Olumbe sikya lutya,
Yezu Kabaka yalusinga, Yezu Kabaka yaluwangula,
Olumbe sikya lutya.
Kwensinzirira okukiriza,
Kyeyalanga edda,
Nti “Ndizuukira,”
Akituusiza, navaayo ne kitiibwa.
Bwetutyo ffena,
Oluvanyuma, edda tuli mugoberera

hymns.title: MPULIRA EDDOBOOZI LY’OMUKAMA LIMPITA
hymns.content:
1. Mpulira eddoboozi ly’Omukama limpita,
Mpulira eddoboozi ly’Omukama lyogera (x2)
Nzuukidde nkyali nammwe, abange muleke kutya nzuukidde (x2)
Ka mbawe emirembe mwenna.

Ekidd: 
Nkulamusa Katonda wange gwe mmanyi
Nnewaayo Katonda wange tondeka (x2)
Ky’oyagala kikolebwe nga bw’osiima
Ky’oyagala kikolebwe nga bw’olonze (x2)
Nngenze ne Katonda wange mweraba
Nsenze wa muganzi wange Yezu Kabaka, (x2)
Alleluia leero alleluia
Alleluia Yezu Kabaka alleluia

2. Mpulira eddoboozi ly’Omukama limpita,
Mpulira eddoboozi ly’Omukama lyogera (x2)
Nzuukidde nkyali nammwe, abange mmwe munkwateko nze
mmwenna (x2)
Munzikirize nzuukidde.........Nkulamusa....

3. Mpulira eddoboozi ly’Omukama limpita,
Mpulira eddoboozi ly’Omukama lyogera (x2)
Nzuukidde nkyali nammwe, abange mugume kati mpangudde (x2)
Okufa nakwo nkwabudde......Nkulamusa.....

4. Mpulira eddoboozi ly’Omukama limpita,
Mpulira eddoboozi ly’Omukama lyogera (x2)
Nzuukidde nkyali nammwe, mmwe nno abajulizi abansenga (x2)
Mugibuulire ensi yonna.

hymns.title: OBUDDE BWE BWASASAANA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Alleluia, Alleluia.
Tusanyuke, yazukira.
Alleluia, Alleluia.
Yazukira mu matulutulu.

1. Obudde bwe bwasasaana,
Ensi yali ng’ekankana.
Eyafa edda nazuukira,
Olumbe naluwangula.

2. Malayika nawanuka,
Nga atukula ng’omuzira.
Natoola ejjinja eddene ennyo,
Ku ntaana nalituulako.

3. Maria omwenenyi najja,
Nga aleeta eby’okuziraga,
Bwatalaba muganzi we,
Neyekanga mu mmeme ye.

4. Nabuuza gwe yasingaana,
Mukaama wange akisiddwa,
Ku luuyi ki mu nnimiro?
Ntegeeza ndyoke muggyewo.

5. Awo Yezu Kabaka nagamba nti,
“Maria nze Mulokozi@.
Maria namukyukira,
Nti Ayi Rabboni omwagalwa.

hymns.title: TULANGIRIRA AMAWULIRE
hymns.content:
Tulangirira amawulire agaleeta eddembe
Tulangirira amawulire ag’obulokofu
Tulangirira amawulire agasanyusa
Agaleeta eddembe ag’obulokofu, amawulire ag’okwesiima.

1. Yezu Kabaka yazuukira                    Yezu Kabaka yazuukira
Ago ge mazima                                 ago ge mawulire agasanyusa
Ye nno bwe yafa                               Ffenna natufiirira
N’atuwonya okufa                            ago ge mawulire agalokola
Kubanga bwe yazuukira                   Olwo bwe yazuukira
Olwo ne tuddawo                              ago ge mawulire agasanyusa
Tata kwewaayo                                 Ffe nga atuwolereza
Yatuwolereza                                    Ago ge mawulire agatugumya
Ye muyinza wa byonna                    Ye muwanguzi
Ye Mukama wa byonna                    ago ge mawulire agasanyusa

2. Gano gano                         gano ge mazima ge nnangirira
Ekigambo kino gwe musingi kwe nnyweredde
GANO GE MAZIMA

A. Bw’olimwesiga Omulokozi             n’omunywererako
Olibeera n’Omulokozi                      gy’alibeera
Talikuleka yalayira                           emirembe
Ye muyambi atayabulira                   amunoonya
Oluusi lw’oterebuka                          n’omuvaako
Akuwondera Omulokozi                   n’akunoonya
Bw’owuliriza ekigambo kye             n’okikwata
Olibeera mu kwesiima                      emirembe
Bw’olituusa bye wasuubiza              n’obinywererako
Oligabana ebikusike                          ewa Kitaawe
Bw’obonabona ne Kristu                   n’omunywererako
Olibeera ne Kristu                             emirembe
Bw’olyegaana Omulokozi                 n’omuvaako
Ng’okutte lya kukuzisa                      emirembe
Bw’onywera n’okuluusana                n’omunywererako
Oligabana ebikusike                          ewa Kitaawe

B. Olibeera n’Omulokozi                       Olibeera n’Omulokozi
Bw’olimwesiga Omulokozi               N'omunywererako
Ye muyambi atayabulira                   Ye muyambi atayabulira
Talikuleka yalayira                            emirembe
Akuwondera Omulokozi                    Akuwondera Omulokozi
Oluusi lw’oterebuka                           n’omuvaako
Olibeera mu kwesiima                       Olibeera mu kwesiima
Bw’owuliriza ekigambo kye              n’okikwata
Oligabana ebikusike                           Oligabana ebikusike
Bw’olituusa bye wasuubiza               n’obinywererako

hymns.title: YEZU KABAKA EYAFA LULI
hymns.content:
Ekidd: 
Luno Alleluia eyimbwe nnyo
Lunaku lwa kitiibwa lwawufu
Mazima ddala Yezu Kabaka azuukidde
Kristu awangudde.

1. Yezu Kabaka eyafa luli lw’ameggwa olumbe!
Wuuno yalugobye, leero azuukidde!
Bwe yayimuse nnamegga olumbe
Yezu Kabaka awangudde. Alleluia, Alleluia.

2. Yenno amaze mbale, entaana yeroopye!
Yiiri yagimenye, amyansa yenna!
Okuzuukira kwaziise olumbe!
Naffe tuluwonye. Alleluia, Alleluia.

3. Ggwe nno amudaagira, lwaaki nno okaaba?
Oh! Kitalo ddala era kyewuunyo!
Abamulabye boogedde nti nno;
Yezu Kabaka yalamuse! Alleluia, Alleluia.

4. Naaza amaziga go, n’ogenda gy’ali
Yezu Kabaka ddala owuuwo alinze otuuke;
Alagiriza n’agamba,”Nzuuno
Nzuuno gwe mwagala.’ Alleluia, Alleluia.

5. Yezu Kabaka okuzuukira, twesiimye ffe nno
Nnyini Ggulu eyafa ku lwaffe ffenna
Olabikako gy’obadde wa eyo,
Ayi eyatwagala! Alleluia, Alleluia.

6. Yezu Kabaka tube wamu gy’ogenda okudda,
Naffe totuleka tutwale ffenna,
Nga otuzuukiza n’otuzza obuggya
Ayi eyatwagala! Alleluia, Alleluia.

hymns.title: ABAAVU MU MWOYO
hymns.content:
1. Abaavu mu mwoyo beesiimye, obwa Kabaka obwo mu ggulu
Balibulya.

Ekidd: I
Bamukisa ..........Beesuneko bali wanngama
Ekidd: II
Yee bamukisa nnyo Omukama alibateeka ku mukono
ggwe ogwa ddyo.

2. Abantu abateefu beesiimye balirya ensi – Bamukisa
Beesuneko balisukkuluma.

3. Abo abasinda beesiimye, balikubagizibwa - Bamukisa
Beesuneko balisanyulwa.

4. Abalumwa enjala n’ennyonta, eyo butukirivu - Bamukisa
Beesiimye balikkusibwa
Beesuneko balimatira.

5. Abalina ekisa, beesiimye, baligirirwa ekisa - Bamukisa
Beesuneko balyerolera.

6. Ab’omutima omulongoofu, beesiimye baliraba Katonda -
Bamukisa. Beesuneko balyerolera.

7. Abaleeta emirembe beesiimye, baana ba Katonda –
Bamukisa. Beesuneko balyegiriisa.

8. Abayigganyizibwa, olw’obutukirivu, beesiimye.
Obwa Kabaka bw’omu ggulu balibulya - Bamukisa
Baliwanngama abo balitikkirwa.

hymns.title: BAKUUME BALEME KUGWA
hymns.content:
Ekidd: 
Bakuume baleme kugwa mu kabi
Batukuze mu mazima g’ekigambo kyo (x2)

1. Erinnya lyo nnalimanyisa abo be wampa
Baali babo n’obampa ng’obaggya mu nsi
Ne bakwata ekigambo kyo.

2. Ebigambo byo nnabibabuulira ne babisiima
Ne bategeerera ddala ne bakkiriza nga ggwe wantuma

3. Beebo nze be nsabira anti sib a nsi eno wabula babo ku bubwo
Kitange era beebo abangulumiza.

4. Kitange Omutukirivu abo be wampa sikusaba kubagya mu nsi
Wabula banyweze mu linnya lyo babeere kimu nga ffe.

5. Nga bwewantuma mu nsi nange bwe mbatumye mu nsi
Nze neetukuza okubeera bo nabo balyoke beetukuze mu mazima.

hymns.title: BOLINGO WA ZAMBE
hymns.content:
1. Bolingo wa zambe boliki bonane,
Wanatinde libiso Yezu Kabaka Mobikisi

Chorus: Bass – Salela kamokozi oko yak aye sengo
Sup: - Salela Mokozi iyaye x 2
Moko Mokozi x 4
Salela Mokozi oyo kaye senga

2. Mozaleli wa zambe nandi Meliyo
Mpa maso malobiyo eyeli ngayi.

Chorus: Bass – Salela kamokozi oko yak aye sengo
Sup: - Salela Mokozi iyaye x 2
Moko Mokozi x 4
Salela Mokozi oyo kaye senga

hymns.title: BEESIIMYE NNYO ABATUKUVU
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Beesiimye nnyo abatukuvu,
Abagoberera amateeka g’Omukama,
Beesiimye nnyo abamwagala,
Abagoberera amakubo ge.

1. Beesiimye bananyini kubo omutali bbala,
Abatambulira muteeka ly’Omukama.
Beesiimye abagendera kubyabakutirira,
Abamunoonya n’omutima gwonna.

2. Ggwe wasaawo byolagira bikumirwe ddala,
Singa nno amakubo manyweevu nenkuuma byoteesa.
Ndikugulumiza mubuteleevu obw’omutima,
Bwendiba njize ebiragiro byobutuufu bwolina.

3. Omuvubuka alikuuma atya ekkubo lye nga tukuvu?
Nga akuuma ebiragiro byo mu mutima gwe.
Nkunoonya n’omutima gwange gwonna,
Nze tondeka kuwunjuka kubiragiro byo.

4. Mu mutima gwange mwenkweka enjogera yo,
Nneme kukola kibi ekikunyiiza ggwe.
Ekitiibwa kibe kya Patri nekya Mwaana, nekya Mwoyo
Mutuukirivu, nga bwekyaliwo oluberyeberye nakakano
nabulijjo, emirembe ne mirembe, Amiina.

hymns.title: BWOMWEEWA OMUKAMA
hymns.content:
1. Bw’omweewa Omukama, n’ewemaliza Omukama,
Talikujuza Omukama oyo, talikujuza emirembe.   x 2

Abamugoberera …………………..,,,,,,,,,,,,,talibajuza emirembe
Talibajuza….Yabasuubiza okubaweera mu nsi muno n’egyebujja

Entalo zo alizirwana, obulamu bwo ali bukuuma, 
talikujuza emirembe.  x 2

Aliba wuwo, Omukama aliba wuwo, 
naawe olibeera eyo eyo mu ggulu.  x 2

3. Buli eyevaamu namugoberera alimuwa……………..Empeera
Buli eyeresa eby’ensi eno alimuwa………………….Empeera
Buli alireka n’emikwano alimuwa…………………..Empeera
Buli alireka n’abazadde alimuwa……………………Empeera
Buli alireka n’abaana alimuwa………………………Empeera
Buli alireka n’obusungu alimuwa…………………...Empeera
Buli alireka n’obuseegu alimuwa…………………...Empeera
Buli alireka eby’obuggaga alimuwa………………...Empeera 

Olifuna kikumu ku nsi kuno 
negyebujja oligabana……Ku mpeera ya balungi emirembe.

Olifuna kikumu ku nsi kuno 
negyebujja oligabana……Ku mpeera y’abalwana obutoosa.

Olifuna kikumu ku nsi kuno 
negyebujja oligabana……Ku mpeera y’abalwana abazira.

4. N’omusalaba olifuna ………………..N’obonabona
N’obonabona ku lulwe ……………...Olwa Kristu.
N’ebizibu olifuna……………………Ogumanga
N’ewewaayo ku lulwe ……………...Eya kutonda
//Osaana onywerere ggwe…………… Ku Katonda
Yezu Kabaka tomuta…………………..Yalokola// (x2) 

5. Omukama Yezu Kabaka 
alikuwa ……………………Alikuwa empeera bw’omweewa

Omukama Yezu Kabaka 
alikuwa ……………………Alikuwa empeera ng’omusanze

Omukama Yezu Kabaka 
alikuwa ……………………Alikuwa empeera ng’onywedde.

6. Kwata ekubo erya kanyigo
Kwata ekubo liri effunda.
Nyweera tota ggwe toddirira.
Alikutwala obeere waggulu eri;
Waggulu awaladde, mu bwakabaka bwe.
	
Yezu Kabaka alikuwa empeera…………………..Alikuwa
Yezu Kabaka alikuwa empeera…………………..Alikuwa,
                                                                         Alikuwa empeera

hymns.title: FFE ABAALEKA BYONNA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Bass – Ffe abaaleka byonna ne tukugoberera,
Mukama tulifuna ki?
Emirundi kikumi
Suprano: Muliddizibwawo mu nsi muno,
N’empeera mu ggulu ey’olubeerera

1. Mmwe abaaleka abazadde ne mujja,
ne mungoberera nze mbasuubiza:
Mmwe abaaleka abazadde ne mujja,
Alibaweera Taata mu ggulu.

2. Mmwe abaaleka amaka ago ne mujja,
ne mungoberera nze mbasuubiza:
Mmwe abaaleka amaka ago ne mujja,
Alibaweera Taata mu ggulu

3. Mmwe abaaleka abibanja ne mujja,
ne mungoberera nze mbasuubiza:
Mmwe abaaleka abibanja ne mujja,
Alibaweera Taata mu ggulu

4. Mmwe abaaleka abitiibwa ne mujja,
ne mungoberera nze mbasuubiza:
Mmwe abaaleka abitiibwa ne mujja,
Alibaweera Taata mu ggulu

5. Mmwe abaaleka emikwano ne mujja,
ne mungoberera nze mbasuubiza:
Mmwe abaaleka emikwano ne mujja,
Alibaweera Taata mu ggulu

6. Mmwe abaaleka obugagga ne mujja,
ne mungoberera nze mbasuubiza:
Mmwe abaaleka obugagga ne mujja,
Alibaweera Taata mu ggulu.

hymns.title: FUBA FUBA EGGULU YE MPEERA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Fuba,fuba eggulu ye mpeera
Fuba,fuba eggulu ye mpeera

1. Eggulu ye mpeera kigambo kya kitiibwa
Nnoonya mu ssanyu lyonna, lino lye lisinga.

2. Eggulu ye mpeera, mu nnaku zo mu kristu
Toterebuka nyweera, ng’osuubira eggulu.

3. Eggulu ye mpeera, emikwaano gy’okunsi gyonna
Giriba gyaaki, Yezu Kabaka bw’omufiirwa.

5. Eggulu ye mpeera, antwaala ye Katonda
Kyandagira nkituusa nga semulugunya.

6. Eggulu ye mpeera, ennaku nga ziwedde,
Tulibeera mu ddembe emirembe gyonna.

hymns.title: GGWE MWAANA WANGE
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Ssirina bigambo, ssirina kirala
Okuggyako Taata okukwebaza
Ssirina mulala, ssirina kirala
Wabula okubeera omwaana akusanyusa.
Taata (Taata) nga nsiimye nnyo Taata
Nneyanziza ( x 2)

1. Ggwe mwaana wange, olwaleero nkubatizza
Ggwe mwaana wange olwaleero gwe nfunye (x 2).
Nkutukuzza obeere mwaana ansanyusa,
Obeere mwaana emirembe (x 2).
Anti nkulonze kulwaleero mu batismu gy’ofunye.

2. Ggwe mwaana wange, nze gwe nnonze nkubatizza,
Ggwe mwaana wange, nze gwenzadde gwe mmanyi (x 2).
Oli muggya, kati oli mwaana ansanyusa,
Kati oli munze, nze Katonda (x 2).
Anti nkulonze kulwa leero lwa kukwagala kwennina.

3. Ggwe mwaana wange, nze gwe nnonze nkusiseeyo,
Gwe mwaana wange nkukyusiza nkwagala (x 2).
Nkutukuzza, obeere wange emirembe,
Obeere mwaana ampulira (x 2).
Kwata bulungi ebiragiro, ongoberere gye ndaga.

hymns.title: KATONDA ALIBAWEERA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Katonda alibaweera abakola obulungi,
Katunnywere tufube,
Laba Yeruzalemu ekibuga ekikulu,
Eggulu ye mpeera yekka ewaffe.

1. Obeeranga mwenkanya ngolamula,
Omugwira n’omunaku tobagoba.
Bwoyamba abanaku nga oyambye ye,
Alikuweera.

2. Ogunjulanga abaana mu ddini,
Bwe butume obusooka
Obutume bwa Kristu obutuusa,
Ye alikuweera

3. Ekisulo kye nsi eno kyaluwunguko,
Ku nsi kuno tuyita lumu,
Emirembe emituufu gye giri eri
ew’Omukama.

hymns.title: MMWE ABANGOBERERA
hymns.content:
Ekidd: 
Mmwe abangoberera sikyabayitanga mmwe baddu
nakamu..........................................Yee
Mbayita mikwano gyange..........Nze nabalonda
mmwe ne mbaganza, mbayita balangira.

1. Mwaleka ebirungi - Mwenna mwaleka ebirungi ne mujja.
Mwaleka abazadde – Mwenna mwaleka abazadde ne mujja.

2. Mwaleka amaka ago - Mwenna mwaleka amaka ago ne mujja.
Mwaleka ebibanja – Mwenna mwaleka ebibanja ne mujja

3. Mwaleka obugagga - Mwenna mwaleka obugagga ne mujja.
Mwaleka ebitiibwa - Mwenna mwaleka ebitiibwa ne mujja

4. Mujje mu kitiibwa - Mwenna abaaleka ebitiibwa ne mujja.
Kitange kabaweere - Mwenna Taata kabaweere Omutonzi.

hymns.title: MMWE KITANGAALA KY’ENSI
hymns.content:
Ekidd: 
Mmwe kitangaala ky’ensi, mmwe ekitangaala ky’ensi
Mwe ekitangaala ekyaka,
Mwakirenga mu nsi muno balabe ebikolwa byammwe ebirungi
B alabe ebikolwa byammwe ebirungi,
Batende Kitammwe (Kitaffe) ali mu Ggulu atudde.

1. Beera musomi atakyukakyuka mu ddini yo entuufu.
Beera musomi atuusa ddini yo,
Omulamu, (omulamu) mu Katonda,
Omutuume, (omutume) ayigiriza abalala,
Eyenyigira mu mirimu gyonna egy’eEklezia etinta.

2. Beera musomi ali mu Katonda, mu mwaana we Yezu Kabaka.
Beera musomi atuusa by’asaba
Mu kukola, mu bulumi ogumanga
Mu bulamu, mu maziga, oyigiriza abalala abeewanika,
Okuleka byonna n’ogoberera Yezu Kabaka.

3. Beera musomi atajuza n’omu eyeeyuna gy’oli,
Beera musomi atuusa okwagala,
Asobola, ayagala okuyamba abanaku, abanaku ng’obayamba
N’obuzira obw’enjawulo
Mu bizibu byonna talikujuza Yezu Kabaka.

hymns.title: MULI KITANGAALA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Mukubatizibwa twafuuka baana be,
Katonda n’atusindika tube batume be,
Ne Mwoyo natuwa ffe tube ettala,
Tube kizimbulukusa mu ggwanga lye. x 2

1. Muli kitangaala eky’ensi,
Muli ttawaaza ey’amazima,
Mwakirenga ensi yonna
Emanye Katonda n’obukulu bwe.

2. Muli basiige mwalondwa.
Mufuuse baana ab’enda emu.
Mulagenga nga mwagalana,
Amayisa gammwe gabe malamu.

3. Muli bitundu eby’omubiri.
Mwayungwa ku nze mwalokoka.
Mufubenga okwekuuma,
Obulamu bwange bubabeeremu.

hymns.title: NFUULA OMUKUTU OGW’EDDEMBE
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Nfuula omukutu ogw’eddembe x 3
Mukutu ..........Ogw’eddembe
Mukutu ..........Ogw’eddembe
Ayi Mukama, buli wantu,
Ntuseeyo okwagala kwo.

1. Nnyamba nneme kunoonya kikubagizo
Naye nnoonye okukubagiza abalala.
Awali obukyayi, nziseewo okwagala kwo.
Awali okunyiiza, ntuseewo obusaasizi.
Nnyamba nnoonye okutegeera okwagala
Naye ssi kwagalibwa.

2. Nnyamba nneme kunoonya kikubagizo
Naye nnoonye okukubagiza abalala.
Enzikiza w’ezze, nziseewo ekitangaala.
Awali obusungu ntuusewo obusaasizi
Nnyamba nnoonye okutegeera okwagala
Naye ssi kwagalibwa.

3. Nnyamba nneme kunoonya kikubagizo
Naye nnoonye okukubagiza abalala.
Awali okuyomba, nziseewo nze eddembe lyo,
Awali agayadde ntuuseewo okunyikira.
Nnyamba nnoonye okutegeera okwagala
Naye ssi kwagalibwa.

hymns.title: NZE NNAKUMANYA DDA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Nze nnakumanya dda
Nze nenkuganza nze nenkulonda
Nze nenkutukuza
Nga tonnabaawo nze nenkunganza nze nenkulonda
Obeere mutume
Obeere mutume obe mulanzi
Obeere mutume obe mulanzi
Obeere mutume obe mulanzi
Obeere mutume obe mulanzi ddala.

1. Genda eri gyenkutuma – genda nze nkutumye
Nnange nnakuyamba buli wantu.

2. Genda olangirire byenkutuma – genda nze nkutumye
Nnange nakuyambanga buli wantu.

3. Nga ndi musiru nze nga ndi muto!
Nga ndi munaku nze nga ndi munafu } x 2
Kati nkutadde ebigambo byange mu kamwa ko
Genda nnakuyambanga } x 2

hymns.title: OBWA KABAKA OBW’OMU GGULU
hymns.content:
1. Obwakabaka obw’omu Ggulu, Bufaanana nga ssemaka
eyafumba embaga ye,
N’atuma abantu bajje ku mbaga gyategese (x 3)
Jangu, jangu, omwagalwa jangu, Mukama wo akuyita akwagala.
Jangu, jangu omwagalwa jangu, Mukama wo akufumbidde
ekijjulo.
Aaa, nngaanyi, nnina ekizibu, nnina okugezesa ente zange ezo
ezirima.
Mukama wange anansonyiwa, mugambe nti; Ssisobodde.

2.  Aaa, nngaanyi, nnaguze ekyalo, nnina okulambula ekyalo kyange 
     ekyo kye nguze.
	Mukama wange anansonyiwa, mugambe nti; Ssisobodde.

3.  Aaa, nnedda sijja kusobola, nnina omugole gwe nnyingizza olwa 
     leero, 
	Mukama wange anansonyiwa, mugambe nti; Ssisobodde.

	Ssemaka n’akalala, n’akalala nalagira nti
	Genda mangu, genda mu nguudo eyo,
	Oleete bonna, bonna, bonna bosanga.
	Abaavu n’abalema, abanaku ne bamuzibe (x 2)
	Bonna, bonna, bonna obagabule, ebirungi bye ntegese. (x 2)

	Naye bali, naye bali – mpaawo alikomba ku mbaga yange (abo)
	Mpaawo alikomba ku mbaga yange Mpaawo alikomba ku mbaga   
     yange (x2)
	Obwakabaka obw’omu ggulu              bwe buliba bwe butyo.
	Mu bwakabaka                                     Bwe buliba bwe butyo.
	Abeebalankanya bonna                        bwe baliba bwe batyo
	Mu bwakabaka                                     Bwe baliba bwe batyo.
Katonda wo akwagala nnyo, akuyita ku mbaga gyategese – eyo mu ggulu.
Obwa Kabaka obwolubeerera gy’ali, ye mbaga gy’akuyitira – eyo mu ggulu.
Obwa Kabaka obwolubeerera gy’ali, kye kitiibwa ky’akuyitira – eyo mu ggulu.
Okubeera ne Mukama wo Yezu Kabaka, lye ssanyu ly’akuyitira - eyo mu
ggulu.
Okubeera n’abalondemu abayite, kye kitiibwa ky’akuyitira – eyo mu ggulu.

Batismu gituukirize - gituukirize – gwe wasenga tomwegaana.
Kye weetema kituukirize – kituukirize – gwe wasenga tomwegaana.
Katonda wo muyinza nnyo - Nnantalemwa – okusamira okwo kwerabire.
Amasanyu amabi galeke – nago galeke – Sitaani takusiikiriza.
Katonda wo mugagga nnyo – mugagga nnyo – ssente tekusuula wabi.

Embaga y’Omukama ng’ekusuba, empeera 
y’abalungi ng’ekusuba                                             Ddala ekusuba nnyo.
Eggulu gye tugenda ng’olisubwa, empeera 
y’abalungi nga ekusuba                                            Ddala ekusuba nnyo.
Ebirungi by’Omukama ng’obisubwa, 
Katonda wa balungi nga akusuba                             Ddala akusuba nnyo.
Nyiikira olwane masajja toddirira – Nyiikira olwane masajja toddirira.
Ddala akusuba nnyo.

hymns.title: TANSAANIRA
hymns.content:
Chorus:
Ayagala Kitaawe okukira nze......Tansaanira, tansaanira
Ayagala nnyina okukira nze......... Tansaanira, tansaanira
Ayagala ababe okukira nze.......... Tansaanira, tansaanira
Ayagala eby’ensi okukira nze...... Tansaanira, tansaanira

B. Buli awatanya okuwonya obulamu bwe – Aba abufiiriddwa
Naye alibuvaamu okubeera Yezu Kabaka – Oyo yeesiimye
alibusanga.

C. Yezu Kabaka - tumwagale tutya, Omulokozi tumukolere ki?
Yezu Kabaka - tumuyisa tutya, okumulaga nga bwe tumufaako?
Be yanunula - tubaagala tutya, okukakasa nga bwe twevaamu?
Ekigambo kye... tukikutte tutya, obulamu bwaffe bukyuse butya?
Buli awatanya okuwonya obulamu bwe – Aba abufiiriddwa
Naye alibuvaamu okubeera Yezu Kabaka – Oyo yeesiimye
alibusanga.

hymns.title: TULI KIMU MU KRISTU
hymns.content:
1. Ekitiibwa kyo nkibawadde, balyoke babeere kimu
Ekitiibwa kyo nkibawadde basse kimu, Kitange bayambe basse kimu
nga ffe,
Bayambe basse kimu, Kitange bayambe basse kimu bonna.
Ekidd: Tuli kimu mu Kristu tuli kimu ffenna,
Tuli kimu mu Kristu tuli kimu ffenna.(x2)

2. Obuyinza bwo mbubawadde balyoke banywere wamu,
Obuyinza bwo mbubawadde basse kimu, Kitange bayambe basse
kimu nga ffe,
Bayambe basse kimu, Kitange bayambe basse kimu bonna.

3. Ebitone byo mbibawadde, balyoke basinze kimu,
Ebitone byo mbibawadde basse kimu, Kitange bayambe basse kimu
nga ffe,
Bayambe basse kimu, Kitange bayambe basse kimu bonna.

4. Abakumanyi mbalagidde, banywere mu kwagalana,
Abakumanyi mbalagidde basse kimu, Kitange bayambe basse kimu
nga ffe,
Bayambe basse kimu, Kitange bayambe basse kimu bonna.

5. Kati kye nsaba kubakuuma, balyoke balangirire,
Kati kye nsaba kubakuuma ng’obagumya, Kitange bayambe
ng’obagumya Taata,
Bayambe ng’obagumya, Kitange bayambe ng’obagumya bonna.

hymns.title: TULIZUUKIRA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Tulizuukira, ffenna tulizuukira,
Tulizuukira ffe mu kitiibwa kya Yezu Kabaka
Ku lw’oluvanyuma, kwolwo (x2)

1. Nga Kitaffe bwe yazuukiza oweereza we oyo Yezu Kabaka,
Naffe twesiga, era tukakasa, ffenna abamumanyi, ng’alituzuukiza.

2. Ng’Omukama bwe yayogera, nga ye w’obuyinza obungi,
Naffe twesiga, era tukakasa, ffenna abamumanyi, ng’alituzuukiza

3. Yezu Kabaka Mukama yayogera, nti omuweereza we nga afudde,
Tafa bumbula, kuba alizuukira ng’ensi eno eweddewo,
Ku lw’oluvanyuma.

4. Yezu Kabaka Mukama yayogera, nti omugaati gw’awa gwa maanyi.
Anti gw’ofuna ye Yezu Kabaka mukama, ajja okuzuukiza bonna abo
b’amanyi

hymns.title: WEYAGALIRE MU MUKAMA
hymns.content:
Chorus: 
Weyagalire mu Mukama,
Alikuwa byonna omutima gwo bye gwegomba.

1. Leka kusuukiira olw’okubeera abakola obubi.
Nandibadde ggwe okukwatirwa obuggya abakola obubi.

2. Ggwe suubira mu Mukama, kola bulungi;
Olyoke obeerewo mu nsi muno ng’otudde ntende.

3. Ekkubo lyo likwase Omukama akukuume.
Suubira mu ye ggwe bulijjo alikuyamba.

4. Obutuufu bwo alibugyayo ng’ekitangaala.
Obwannanyini obubwo alibugyayo ng’ettuntu.

5. Ggwe wumuliranga mu Mukama era suubira mu ye ggwe.
Omukama ayagala obutuufu n’abo abatukiridde talikuleka.

6. Abatuufu b’olonze balirya ensi.
Baligibeerako bo mu ddembe emirembe gyonna.
